item.text: ('a) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 秘密經第二十三部
@#/ /spyan 'dren rgyud gsum pa/ bla ma'i bla ma bla med dkon mchog gsum/ /che ba'i che
mchog dbang mchog dam pa la/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal dang bas skyabs su mchi/ /gnam sa'i
mnga' bdag skye dgu'i longs spyod gzhi/ /bstan pa dam pa chos kyi mgon mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa brgya
byin rgyal chen yul 'khor srung / /'phags skyes mig mi bzang dang lus ngan po/ /'jig rten skyong ba
dbang po me lha dang / /gshin rje bden bral chu lha rlung gi lha/ /rnam thos bu dang dbang bdag sa yi lha/ /
nyi zla gza' skar phyogs kyi glang po rnams/ /blon po sde dpon lha mo phyogs mtshams srung / /btsun
mo sras bcas so so'i 'khor kun dang / /lha yi sde dpon chen por mtshan grags pa/ /khyab 'jug
tshogs bdag nan ti kar ti ka /nag po chen po stobs chen stobs po che/ /gnod 'dzin pad ma pad

ma chen po dang / /dung dang dung chen gang po shin du gang / /mgrin bzang gang ba bzang po nor bu bzang / /bum rna dril rna rna gsum rna bo che/ /yang dag shes dang yang dag rgyal ba dang / /rgyal ba'i khyu mchog 'brog gnas gangs
la gnas/ /bde ri lngas rtsen lnga len tshigs lnga ser/ /mgrin bcu rnam 'jigs 'brug sgra nam mkha'i dbyangs/ /stong gsum rgya mtsho dga' bo bsnyen dga' bo/ /ma dros gzi can nor rgyas gdon la 'jebs/ /

drang srong rig 'dzin char sprin lo tog lha/ /lam lha nyin mtshan dus mtshams tshes grangs yud/ /ha nu man ta la sogs mthu chen dang / /tshig dbang lha mo sgra dbyangs dbyangs can dang / /be'u 'dra dpal gyi lha mo 'od zer can/ /

dkar sham brjod skyob gang gA ya mu na/ /sras 'phan dung can ri mkhar nag mo dang / /ma bdun sring mo bdun dang sring mo bzhi/ /nag mo chen mo ral pa gcig la sogs/ /lha mo chen mo gnod sbyin chen mo dang / /srin mo chen mo sha

za chen mo dang / /gzhon nu'i sku 'tsho rdzu 'phrul dbang gis 'phags/ /slag chen brjid pa lha dmag g.yul du bstod/ /rmad grags chen po'i dge bsnyen chen po dang / /lha sras gzhon nu klu sras gzhon nu dang / /rig 'dzin

gzhon nu drang srong gzhon nu dang / /bi k+Shus bsten pa'i gzhon nu lnga brgya spun/ /gnod sbyin gzhon nu ti ra ka la sogs/ /gzi brjid chen po'i gzhon sde thams cad dang / /skye dgu'i bdag po la sogs lha dang klu/ /gnod sbyin dri za

lto 'phye lha ma yin/ /gser 'dab grul bum srin po mi 'am ci/ /'byung po sha za yul bdag 'dre la sogs/ /cang shes snying rje'i lam du zhugs dgu dang / /rig pa'i lcags kyus zin pa kun gson cig /gang gi ming la

'ang bkra shis dpal 'bar ba/ /yi ge gnyis 'brel dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan/ /skyes bu gang zhig nyan tam 'don pa yang / /gzha' gsang yun gyi chu srid 'thob 'gyur na/ /yon tan phun sum dpag yas dkon mchog la/ /

bsnyen bkur mnyes byed bka' la gus pa dang / /chos thos nyams su len pa ci zhig smos/ /de bas gsung rab dpag bsam rgyas pa yi/ /lha yi longs spyod tshal du kun gshegs te/ /chos rje nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka'/ /

bdud sde lta min g.yul las rgyal byed pa/ /rin chen 'od mchog lha dbang gtsug gi rgyan/ /bag yod dad pa'i spyi bos blang bar mdzod/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod tshur shog /bdag dang sems can kun kyang yongs su mya ngan las

'das par bgyis la/ sems can ma rgal bas ma 'jigs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs btsal bas mi ngoms pa la sems zhog shig /mngon par 'du byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyang ma gtang shig /

sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku yang ma dor cig /'dod chags dang bral ba'ang thob par gyis shig /chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang btsal bar gyis shig /chos thams cad la gzhan gyi

dring 'jog pa med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyang bar gyis shig /zhing gi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur yang shes par gyis shig /sems can yongs su smin par bya bas ma skyo shig /bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma

spong shig /mngon par shes pa la yang rnam par 'phrul par gyis shig /chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma g.yo shig /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang ma gtang shig /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang 'byung bar gyis

shig /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig /chos nyid brjod du med pa las kyang 'da' bar ma byed cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang byin gyi brlabs kyang yongs su

ston cig /byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang ma dor cig /skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang snang bar gyis shig /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po yang yongs su ston cig ces/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni lta ba'i

chos zung dang snrel zhir sgrub pa mngon bar bsgrub pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las yang dag phul gyi chos bcu pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi

phrin las te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang byung gi phrin las gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa med par bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /lha'i rgyal po dbang chen mchog sbyin gtso/ /dpa' bo 'jigs med 'jig

rten kun la grags/ /shes rab 'od gsal zla ba nya ba'i zhal/ /skyes mchog smon lam phrin las gcig pa'i mched/ /tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten skyong la sogs/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin ri rab srub shing dang / /snying rje brtson 'grus

klu yi srub thag gis/ /shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i bcud/ /dam chos bdud rtsi'i 'gron du gshegs kun la/ /chos bsgrags bsod nams dbyig kyang spyir 'bul gyis/ /srin dmag lha min g.yul las rgyal

ba dang / /lha yi rgyal srid dbu rmog btsan par bsngo/ /gzi byin g.yog 'khor longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /mthu rtsal go 'phang khyad par thob par bsngo/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon shes pha rol phyin la sogs/ /rnam par thar pa'i

sgo kun rdzogs pa dang / /dge ba'i phrin las dgongs dgu grub par bsngo/ /dam chos bdud rtsi'i bde bas lus khyab ste/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa'i rgyud las grol bar bsngo/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bka' drin byams pa'i gnyen/ /

bdag cag nyon mongs mtshon gyis rmas pa rnams/ /thugs rje'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bskyang ba dang / /gang gis gang la spyi bos mthu skyed cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung bar gsol/ /ma 'os 'khrul pa'i nongs

pa mchis so 'tshal/ /dus rig rgyud mkhyen kun la bzod par gsol/ /lha tshogs chos kyi sbyin pa'i bkra shis kyis/ /phun sum tshogs 'dzin dam chos rgyas par smon/ /rgyud gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgyud gsum pa/

tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen lha dang klu/ /gnod sbyin dri za lto 'phye lha ma yin/ /gser 'dab grul bum mi 'am ci la sogs/ /sems can gang dag bde gshegs sras rnams dang / /nor bdun phun sum dpal bzhed kun
gson cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /dkon mchog bsam mi khyab la mngon dad pa'i/ /

rnam smin bla na med pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bgrang bar yang / /dkon mchog mtshan thos tsam yang rnyed dka' bas/ /brgya lam lan cig khom ldan lus rnyed rnams/ /rdzu 'phrul dad pa'i shugs
kyis 'dir gshegs te/ /rnam par grol ba'i rin chen sna tshogs gling / /zab mo rgyal ba'i bka' la kun gson cig /bsngo ba gang dag dam chos lhur len 'dir 'dus pa/ /lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs mthu chen

rnams/ /chos kyi bsod nams shas kyang khyed bzhes te/ /gzi byin 'khor 'phel dgongs pa grub par bsngo/ /gsung rab bdud brtsi'i rjes su sgrubs mdzod la/ /gang la ci rigs so sor dpal bskyed cing / /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung bar gsol/ /rgyud gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rad nol ka nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs shes bya ba

theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du

tshang ba thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs

so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams mngon par bsgrags dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon cha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sra ba dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song spong pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang
mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi len mi 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung dka' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po dga' 'byung dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
mgyogs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/

dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par 'byung ba/ dbyangs sgra thogs pa med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa/ rjes su chags pa dang /

khong khro ba dang bral ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ khams gsum la ma chags pa/ g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nges par skyes pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug

pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' don yod pa la mos pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon

bar brtson pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ stong pa nyid spyod yul ba/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos

kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / spros pa med

pa dang ma spros pa dang blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa dang dngos po med pa dang gnas pa med pa ste de ltar rtogs par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings 'byung

ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung ba med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med pa rtogs

pa ste/ dngos po gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub la rnam pa du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi rnam pa ni tshad med de de ni tshad dang ldan par bstan par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings rnam
par rtog par bgyid dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog go/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings

rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang /
yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni zab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ci skad smras pa de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad spros pa med pa ni byang chub ces bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa 'di la dris shig dang / 'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan
'das la mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs so/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'dir btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can gyi khams yal bar 'dor ba ma yin te/ rigs

kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad med cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po 'di la dris shig dang / 'dis khyod la ston par 'gyur

ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di la dri bar bgyi'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thob pa yin na de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skal

ba dang ldan pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag kun du bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang mang du bgyis pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur
rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras te/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis khyod byang chub sems

dpa' kun du bzang po la dris shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/ theg pa

chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po yin gyis bdag la ma gsung shig / yang rigs kyi bu khyod ni stong pa nyid

la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' kun

du bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis bdag la skabs phye na khyod la bdag yi ge 'bru gnyis shig 'dri'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par

shes na dris shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i gzhi'i don gang

yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsam gyis

mi khyab pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni ma spros pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni

blang ba med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsnyad du med pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas

kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes ji skad bstan/ byang chub sems dpa'

kun du bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan pa 'di ni bstan du med pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan du med na ci zhig bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa/

'jam dpal bstan du med pa ni btags te bstan to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras btags pas ci zhig 'dogs par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal btags pas ni dngos

po yang mi 'dogs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te btags pas dngos po yang mi 'dogs dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs na theg pa gsum po dag ji ltar bstan/

byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pa la chags par ma byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o

zhes bstan pa'i phyir te/ gang dngos po med pa'i phyir zhe na/ phung po lnga dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ byang chub spros pa dang bcas pa yin nam/ 'on te spros pa med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'

kun du bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni spros pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ spros pa med pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub dang / spros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su
dbyer med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la rigs kyi bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /gtam 'di

brjod pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di lta bu ni rnam pa 'tshal bar mi rung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad lags sam/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i

sgo 'di ni mos par bgyi dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstan pa 'di legs par smras lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad

smras pa bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa yin no/ /'di ni chos kyi char chen po yin no/ /de nas shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags te/ de la yi ge mi dmigs/ tshig 'bru mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de

bzhin te/ chos kyi dbyings la tshig 'bru mi snang / don kyang mi snang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa gang lags/ rnam

pa gang lags/ rtags gang lags/ mtshan ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pa gang yin pa

de stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo / /de nas

bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams las ring du gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dbang

phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na nyan thos kyis ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa la lan gdab pa'am/ spyod pa'i byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i

nus pa dang mthu ga la yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu

bstan pa lags na bstan pa 'di gang la bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni bstan pa med pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la

'di skad ces smras so/ /gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thob bam/ smras pa de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci khyod so so'i skye bo'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na

ci khyod slob pa'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so'i skye bo

yang ma yin/ slob pa yang ma yin/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed

par mi byed do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ni rgan rabs thu bo mchog yin gyis btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig /gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i dngos pos ni ci yang 'thob par

mi 'gyur/ mngon bar rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje ngan ngon gyis kyang ri brag chen po rnam par 'jig go/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod kyi spu'i

khung bu gcig na shes rab 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo lta bu'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do/ /rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ba lang

glang po che shin du mi bzad pa chen po de yang mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung ngus dul bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/ kho bo ni nyam chung ba ste/ glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'gyed ga

la nus/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na mi dmus long gis shul du mchi ba 'am/ grong khyer mthong bar yang rngo mi thog na/

nas khyim du mchi ba'i rngo lta ga la thog ste/ de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du glang po che chen po lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni dmus long dang mtshungs par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni de tsam du rgya che ba

lags so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/ da ci bgyir yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig /shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs

pa'i 'od kyis sems can ji snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu las sems can dgu khri nyis stong gis chos mngon bar rtogs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog ta

la la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab

kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis/ zhal mngon bar bstan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya

bar 'thun pa sha stag go/ /phyogs gcig ji lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting

nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyi brlabs dang /

khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bstan pas 'di lta ste chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par

bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par dgrol ba dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang / kun du sbyor bar bya ba dang / skad thams cad brjod par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug par

bya ba dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i chos bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi

rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa 'di dag thams cad khyod la byin gyis rlob kyis rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las brtsams te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis

chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / chod pa med pa dang / brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid

dang / tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang zil gyis mi non pa dang / zhum pa med pa dang / 'phrogs pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod pa bzang po nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid

thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi mgo la nyug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos

kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu/ de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang /

nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pas rgya che ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon

pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la

'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gang dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni gang yin/ gang las bsams

te de skad smra/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod cig /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang

chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye bar skyes

pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang gzhon nur gyur pa dang rgyal tshab dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po de dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /

gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzang ba 'am/ mdzes pa'am/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'am/ rgya che ba'am/ gzi brjid che ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'am/ kun rjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa

'am/ rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngam/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod cing thog ma nyid du

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang /

'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang / mos pa dang rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog

ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba thams cad shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i mig

gi shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa ste/ bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

dag sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu bya ba dang zil

gyis mi gnon pa dang / sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang phrad pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor du bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
bskor ba dang / sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad la sbyor zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan par bya ba'i sems dang bde bar bya ba'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems

dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems dang / kun du bsrung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te/ sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag skyed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las

dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung mnod pa dang / kha ton la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mang du thos nas rab tu dben pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /rab tu dben par gyur nas dge

ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dus shes par gyur

nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /don shes par gyur nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur nas brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid

la sbyar bar bya'o/ /rmongs pa med par gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon bar brtson par byed cing gong du

gnas gang dag thob pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i

sras dag de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed de/

bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / dbugs 'byin pa med

pa nyid dang / gnas med pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang / rtsol ba med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa'i phyir sbyor bar mi byed/ mi sbyor

bar yang mi byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /

chos kyi dbyings brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang /

gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher chos rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid

sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam

par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su sbyong bar byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos nyid las phyir mi zlogs pa dang / sangs rgyas la

mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa dang / chos nges par sems pa dang / sems can la rnam par dpyod pa dang / zhing la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang /

las la rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'khor ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/ yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcu po de dag gis gsung rab

'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa

la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid

rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung

ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa

nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par

dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid

du rtogs par byed cing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par

gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge
ba'i las gang ci rtsom yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba dang / sems

can thams cad la snying brtse bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad

dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can mtha' yas pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa dang / sems can grangs med pa dang / sems can bsam gyis

mi khyab pa dang / sems can mtshungs pa med pa dang / sems can gzhal du med pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa

nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon bar zhen pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir ti/

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa

gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thos na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi

bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa'am/

bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams rgya chung zhes 'chad pa'am/ sems can gyi khams rgya che zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams kun

nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul sla zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul dka' zhe'am/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chung zhe'am/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag

'jig ce'am/ mi 'jig ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings yod ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings med ces 'chad kyang rung ste sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems

dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mtshan

ma med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / med pa nyid dang / brdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta

bu nyid dang / rmi lam lta bu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba'i chos can

du gyur cing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par

gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa bcu thos na/ sangs rgyas

kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas yod do zhe'am med do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang /

byang chub sems dpa' yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par 'byung ngo zhe'am nges par mi 'byung

ngo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe'am ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon to zhe'am byon pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar byung ba'o zhe'am/

da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe'am mi zad do zhes bya ba dang / dus gsum po dag mtshan nyid gcig ce'am mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las

phyir mi ldog pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu

gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /mang ba dang gcig pa nyid dang / yi ge la don sgro btags pa dang / don la yi ge sgro btags pa dang / dngos pos dngos po

med pa sgro btags pa dang / dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan mas mtshan ma med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa sgro btags pa dang /

mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par 'byung zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag

la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam

par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras

bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing mos

pa la rtog pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ 'dod pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa

yin/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon bar shes pa myur ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos

mngon bar bsgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas

kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba dang / dri ba grangs med pa dri ba dang / yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sgra skad la sbyor ba tshad med pa dang /

sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas pa la sbyor zhing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de

dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam

par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la gzhon nu rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la

mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos nyid rtogs par bya ba

la mkhas pa yin/ nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kun rdzob

kyi bden pa nges par rtog pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par

brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kun du spyad pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang

'khor du rnam par dpyad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyi brlabs dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i pha rol gnon pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bsgrub pa la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sgrub kyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag

'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la dbang bskur ba

thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni shes pa mngon bar sgrub pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams
grangs med pa byin gyis rlob pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sems gcig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba byed pa mang ba yin/
sems can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par rig par byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la
sems gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/

sems can grangs med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man chad gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi las shes par mi nus/ ngag gi las shes par mi nus/ yid kyi las shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ 'das pa'i dus

la rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus/ blos rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ sems kyi yul shes par mi nus/ ye shes kyi spyod yul shes par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni

dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod pa mdzad de/ bcu gang zhe na/

'di lta ste/ dus gsum shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang / chos thams cad mngon bar shes pa dang / sangs rgyas

kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

rnam par gzhag pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas

kyi mthus phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu
'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg go/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab

tu 'khrugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/ /lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon bar bab bo/ /

lha'i phye ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i pad ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan phreng gi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi char

yang mngon bar bab bo/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo / /lha'i snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo / /lha'i nga ro yang grag go/ /gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste lhag chad med do/ /tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i

chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang ming chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros

bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi thad nas 'dir phyin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlab kyis de dag thams cad du chos bstan pa 'di byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te/ lhag chad med do/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag ni khyod kyi dpang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin to/ /bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad

kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed phyin par gyur to/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos

kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rang byung shin du rnam dag blo mnga' ba/ /mdzes shing gzugs

kyi stobs dang ldan gyur pa/ /bsnyen dka' mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /do zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / /kun brjod bzang dang rjes su bstan pa dang / /sdug bsngal
bzad rlag 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur nas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur
ba med pa yi/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang / /rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang / /gzhan min dngos por rnam par

rtogs bya phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na/ /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams gang yod pa/ /de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems

'jog byed/ /ting 'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang / /de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa/ /de dag gnas skabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten

brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams/ /ci 'dra ci 'dra de yid dang ba der/ /rim pa de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'jig rten kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang / /lhag pa'i bsam pa tha
dad rnam gsum nas/ /bstan bcos du ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i khams/ /gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yod kun gyi/ /khams

kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems de 'jog /chos 'dir kun du 'gro bar gang gyur cing / /dge ba'i 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa/ /yang dag rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /
byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang / /sems can ji ltar sa las 'byung 'gyur zhes/ /chags med mig ni rab tu dbye ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du
brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus na/ /sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang / /sngon gyi gnas rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa
sems 'di 'jog /ji ltar 'gro bar sems can 'ching byed pa/ /kun du sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i/ /nyon mongs zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten

gsum na tha snyad gang btags dang / /ngag lam sngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa/ /brda yi bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste/ /

stong pa mi g.yo rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/ /don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams dag tu sa g.yo bstan pa dang / /rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs pa dang / /

de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'od zer rtse mo re las 'od zer rnams/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu kun du rab tu 'gyad/ /de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i

phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa/ /de dag rang gi lag tu mngon sprul te/ /sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems
'jog byed/ /zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun/ /gnod pa med par lag pa'i mthil bzhag nas/ /chos rnams srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /

rgya mtsho rnams na ji snyed chu yod pa/ /skra rtse'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jug par byed/ /ma lus mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi bag /

gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed cing / /phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'jig rten 'di na 'das dang de bzhin du/ /ma 'ongs sreg pa'i bskal pas 'jigs pa

rnams/ /bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /dus gsum dag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / /ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi/ /chos kyi rang bzhin
rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams/ /skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya

ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/ /rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa
sems 'di 'jog /lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /

'jig rten kun gyi sgra rnams ci 'dra ba/ /skad cig gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing / /zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtog par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /'jig rten gsum po ma lus rtogs par byed/ /

sems can kun gyis rab tu rnam par shes/ /lce yangs rgya chen rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /zhing rnams kun du brjod dang 'dra bar yang / /skad cig gcig la lta gyur sel bar byed/ /rnam

rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhing rang byung gi/ /chos rnams skad cig gcig

la rtog bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams/ /rnam pa kun du mngon par sprul byed cing / /yid las byung ba de dag rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan
pa sems 'jog byed/ / 'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams/ /ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog /sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed

tshig gcig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bskal pa zad kyi de la nyams pa med/ /tshig rab dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad

kyi/ /'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ /phyogs rnams kun du 'gro yang lus kyis sam/ /ngag gam yid kyis gang du'ang chags pa med/ /

dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir/ /byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog /byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin/ /gzhal yas bskal par phyogs su rgyu byed cing / /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o

zhes/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten tha dad par/ /'jig rten bdag por rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur ba/ /gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrogs par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /

byang chub don du srid par spyad spyod tshe/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyor gang yin pa/ /de'i bsngags pa rtag tu rjod par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /chos mchog chos rab phul du phyin pa dang / /khyad par

'phags chos bla med gang yod pa/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /che nyid 'di na yod kyi gzhan med pa/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'

sbyor bar byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /tshad med gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad gyur ci 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /ting

'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang / /de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa dag /de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod par byed/ /'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang / /dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /

'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu ma bskor ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya/ /shin du sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad dang / /ngan song sa rnams dag tu gnod gyur pa'i/ /gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur pa

de/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig byang chub don du sems 'jog pa/ /de ni dang po'i byang chub sems dpar bstan/ /bslab pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin nges byas pa/ /ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de'i

yin/ /nad bral rnams kyi bstan pa ji bzhin du/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa bya ba'i phyir/ /de ltar thog ma su zhig sems bskyed pa/ /'di ni gnyis te dang po'i las can no/ /phan pa thob byed sems dang rab dang bde/ /gnyen dang

sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang / /kun du bsrung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems/ /slob dpon sems dang snyoms par ston pa'i sems/ /de 'dra dag la sems gnas gyur pa de/ /lung nod kha ton byed par sbyar bar bya/ /

mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su gzhug /dben par gyur nas dge bshes sten du gzhug /dge bshes rnams la bka' blo bde bar bya/ /dus tshod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya/ /dus shes gyur nas shin du 'jigs

med bya/ /'jigs pa med nas don la brtson par bya/ /don shes gyur nas de bzhin chos brjod bya/ /chos rnams kun la rmongs gyur med par bya/ /rmongs pa med par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos

la bsam par bya/ /'di ni dang po'i las can brjod pa ste/ /byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste/ /'di la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsum

pa gang yin pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan la rab tu sbyor/ /mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang / /bdag med pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang / /de bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang / /mngon bar 'du byed med dang dben pa dang / /

'di dag thams cad rtog pa med yin par/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rtog par byed/ /sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang / /brtag par bya phyir de ni gzeng yang bstod/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas mu med ces/ /

de ltar de ni dpyod du gzhug par bya/ /'di na sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang / /phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa/ /de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug /rgya chen chos rnams kun dang

khams rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin ma lus mthar thug brtag bya ba/ /de ni sangs rgyas sras po sbyor byed la/ /phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa/ /bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar

byed/ /blo ldan de ni dngos med dngos po rtogs/ /dam chos gnas su skyes te legs par skyes/ /de ni rang gi sa las yongs mi ldog /sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa skye/ /rtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan/ /

sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar rnam par dpyod/ /las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhing rnams dang / /rnam par smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das/ /rnam par dbye ba rgyal ba'i sras kyis shes/ /de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpar

brjod/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang / /ma byon dag kyang chos rnams rnam dpyad nas/ /grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang / /rang byung rnams kyi grub pa ci 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams

cad ni/ /dus gsum mnyam nyid rjes su zhugs pa shes/ /nam yang mnyam nyid bye brag 'byed mi byed/ /de ni dus gsum tha dad med par 'jug /gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa ste/ /

'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de/ /byang chub don du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa

ste/ /bsod nams las dag brtsams pas mthar phyin byed/ /de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang / /'jig rten kun gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang / /phan par 'dod dang bde ba thob byed dang / /snying brtse ba dang skye dgu dgrol 'gyur byed/ /

'jig rten gnod gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'dren par byed cing rab tu dang bar byed/ /sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che/ /'jig rten thams cad mtha' ma med pa

dang / /de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs med dang / /mtshungs med bsam yas mnyam med gzhal yas dang / /stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ /sbyor ba phun tshogs phan dang snying brtse ldan/ /

de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra ste/ /yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyis bstan/ /de ni sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang / /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa med/ /shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog med/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas

pas dbyer mi phyed/ /sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /spyod pa'i bsngags dang bsngags pa ma yin dang / /sems can chung ngam yang na che'o zhes/ /thos par gyur kyang bsam las nur ba med/ /sems can nyon

mongs can nam rnam dag gam/ /gdul sla zhe 'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am/ /chos dbyings chung zhe'am yang na rgya che zhe'am/ /'jig par 'gyur zhe'am 'chags par 'gyur zhe 'am/ /chos dbyings yod ce'am med ces thos

gyur kyang / /dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de/ /nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de/ /sangs rgyas chos 'dir bsam pa shin du nges/ /mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / /dngos med rang bzhin

brdzun zhing dben pa dang / /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mi g.yor 'dra ba yi/ /chos mchog zhi ba 'di 'dra nyan par byed/ /de ltar mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /spyod pa yod

dam med ces nges par dpyod/ /'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog /de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am ma 'das she'am/ /ma byon ce 'am ma byon ma yin zhe'am/ /byung ngam ma byung zad dam mi zad dam/ /de bzhin

mtshan nyid gcig gam mtshan nyid med/ /gcig dang tha dad rnam pa mang po dang / /don dam tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa/ /thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du/ /mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed/ /

mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang / /mtshan nyid med dang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang / /rnam par phye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams/ /thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug par byed/ /gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

ni/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / /'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba ston/ /pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtog byed cing / /de dag rnams kyi mos pa spyod par byed/ /

sems can spyod dang rjes su 'thun chos dang / /zhing rnams 'jig dang chags pa rnams kyang shes/ /ji ltar 'dod sbyin myur du mngon shes thob/ /phyogs rnams kun du yid ni 'jug par byed/ /bde gshegs bsngags

pa'i chos rnams thos nas kyang / /de la de ni nur bar 'gyur ba med/ /yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang / /de bzhin byin gyis brlab dang rnam dpyod dang / /ji ltar skad cig grangs med 'gro 'gyur ba/ /zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya/ /

de ni dri ba grangs med 'dri bar byed/ /lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston/ /de la sgra skad sbyor ba 'byam klas dang / /skad cig la yang sangs rgyas grangs med brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gang yin pa/ /sems can rnams

kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin shes/ /de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang / /spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang / /tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang / /'jig rten rnam par phye dang sngon mtha' dang / /brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa

dag / /ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa yin/ /pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshar 'byin te/ /der yang ji ltar kun du spyad pa dang / /gnas dang de bzhin 'jug par bya ba dang / /pho brang 'khor ni ci 'dra dpyad pa dang / /dam chos

rgyal po'i dbang bskur ci 'dra dang / /byin gyi brlabs dang gzhan gnon ci 'dra dang / /chos la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste/ /'di ni rgyal tshab sa la 'jug pa yin/ /de tsam gyis na de'i mthar thug ste/ /ji skad bstan bzhin gzhan

du 'gyur ba med/ /tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na/ /tshul ldan rgyal tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs/ /dbang bskur gang yin bde gshegs sras gcig ste/ /thu bo khyad 'phags mthar phyin bdag nyid can/ /skra thigs gcig

gis chu tshad gzung du rung / /'dir ni bsam pa bgrang bas rtogs ma yin/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra ste/ /'di na sems can la las zhing rnams kun/ /phra rab rdul du rlags nas ma lus 'grang / /grangs med 'di snyed

cig ces gcod byed pa/ /de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpas shes/ /'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang / /rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi/ /sa bon gyur pa

byang chub sems de skye/ /thog mar byang chub sems shes gang brjod pa/ /de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de/ /'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na/ /de las gong du brjod pa ci zhig yod/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' kun du bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par smras so/ /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams

ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin na/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang kun

chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag ni nges par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/

shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi rna lam du

'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag grag par gyur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis lag tu thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas bdag ni dmus

long dang 'dra ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur par ma bas kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dmus long

lta bur gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bshad du

gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad skul cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang sgrogs shig /chos kyi phyag

rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor der sgrogs shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don

gyi phyir yongs su skom pas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la don 'di'i skabs brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad cing

bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ston par 'gyur gyis 'du bar gyis shig /khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin du rnyed par dka'o/ /de nas skad

cig de nyid la brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol

ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams
cad kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab na yang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ rigs kyi bu
gang la la dag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par

'gyur ro zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu

khyod song la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos bshad par gsol ba thob shig /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shing blag sha dang sa la'i drung gzhan zhig na dkyil mo dkrung bcas shing lus mi g.yo

bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas

'dug par gyur te/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i lus dang dpal gyis lam me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun ba shA

ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don 'di gang yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ kho bos ni khyod dang 'gyed mi nus so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ khyod snying las chung ngur

'dug shig dang khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan par bya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo nyan gyis khyod kyis shod cig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ stong gsum gyi stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams

cad 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to/ lha'i bu mo mang po

yang 'dus par gyur to/ /dge slong gi 'khor dang / dge slong ma'i 'khor dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang / 'thab bral gyi 'khor

dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin du nyan thos

kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen

po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan

pa steng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag dang nyan thos chen po gzhan

dag dang / grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to/ /khams kyi rgyal po dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang khyim bdag gi 'khor dag kyang 'dus

par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das deng 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags/ de ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la gsol ba thob shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la

'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rin po che bstan pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di shod cig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs nyan par 'gyur ba su yin/

shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'khor bzhi 'dus pa 'di dag dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ste/ kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu

la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos nyan pa 'di dag ni sgyu mas byung ba sha stag na kho bos su la chos bshad/ nyan pa ni su yin/ 'chad pa ni su yin/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis shod

cig /kho bos mnyan to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /smras pa/

shA ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni tshig med pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bstan du med pa yin te/ de dag ni bstan du med cing

mnyan du med do/ /gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bu bstan pa de dag thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa/ mtshan ma med pa bstan pa/ smon pa med pa bstan pa/ blang ba med pa bstan pa/ dor ba med pa bstan pa/

spros pa med pa bstan pa ste/ ma spros pa bstan pa yin no/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dga' nas mgrin gcig tu 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya/ 'jam dpal

gyis smras pa/ rab 'byor gzungs 'di ni skye ba med par yid la bya'o/ /dngos po med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / dor ba med par yid la bya'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na

'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi drug bcu rtsa gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du

bzang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ci 'dra ba zhig

lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams gsum pa yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no/ /gang sems
