phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/ /phyogs rnams ma lus kun du brtan pa 'jug /kha cig mnyam bzhag kha cig langs gyur cing / /'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang / /de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /gzugs kyi

lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na/ /de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur la/ /mi ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin

te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /sgra yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur

ba/ /sgra dang skad rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/ /sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /

de dag sna yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs/ /dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur

cing / /sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /sna yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag lce yi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /ro mchog kun gyi lam nas rnam par ldang / /

gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnams dang ldan/ /ro mchog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston

cing / /lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /reg pa'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten bde ba skyed pa'i reg la

zhugs/ /reg pa'i lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / /

chos kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang / /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /chos la gnas pa'i 'jug pa rab tu zhugs/ /chos lam rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /sems ni ma skyes ma byung

rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing / /sems kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang / /de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /lang tsho shugs la gnas pa rnams las ldang / /lang tsho shugs gnas
rnams la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus las rnam par ldang / /rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma yi lus las ldang / /dge bsnyen dad ma'i lus la

mnyam bzhag cing / /dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus las rnam par ldang / /dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dge slong ma yi lus las rnam par ldang / /dge slong ma'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /dge

slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang / /dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /slob dang mi slob lus las rnam par ldang / /slob dang mi slob lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus las rnam par

ldang / /rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par ldang / /sangs rgyas sku mchog rab la mnyam bzhag cing / /lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par ldang / lha yi lus

gzugs la ni mnyam bzhag cing / /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi lus las ldang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus las rnam par ldang / /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la

mnyam bzhag cing / /'byung po kun gyi lus las rnam par ldang / /'byung po kun gyi lus la mnyam bzhag cing / /spu yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam par ldang / /spu sgo gcig la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /spu sgo thams cad

nas ni rnam par ldang / /spu sgo kun la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang / /skra rtse gcig gi khyon la mnyam bzhag cing / /skra rtse kun gyi khyon las rnam par ldang / /skra rtse kun gyi khyon

la mnyam bzhag cing / /phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang / /rdul gcig la ni mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /ma lus rdul rnams kun las rnam par ldang / /rdul rnams ma lus kun la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya

mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang / /rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing / /nor bu'i shing tog dag las rnam par ldang / /shing tog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur nas/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer sgo

nas ldang / /rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo la mnyam bzhag cing / /rgya mtsho'i chu yi chu klung rnams las ldang / /rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyam bzhag cing / /bdag nyid chen po me yi lam nas ldang / /me yi lam la mnyam par

bzhag gyur cing / /rlung gi lam las dran ldan rnam par ldang / /rlung gi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /bdag nyid chen po sa yi gzhi las ldang / /sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / /lha kun gzhal med

khang las rnam par ldang / /lha kun gzhal med khang la mnyam bzhag cing / /dran ldan de dag mkha' las rnam par ldang / /yon tan bsam yas bsags pa de dag gi/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab/ /

rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su/ /bshad pa mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi spyod/ /'gro las rnam smin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni/ /klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas

rnam 'phrul dang / /bsam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya/ /de dag 'dra ba'i dpe zla cang med de/ /mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis/ /bstan na
myur du don rnams shes par 'gyur/ /rnam thar brgyad kyi dbang la gnas pa yi/ /nyan thos gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur/ /mang por gyur nas phyir yang gcig gyur te/ /mkha' la bsam

gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar bar byed/ /smad nas me 'bar stod nas chu yi rgyun/ /stod nas me 'bar smad nas chu yi rgyun/ /'gro dang 'greng dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang / /lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la bsam mi khyab/ /de ni snying rje che dang mi
ldan zhing / /byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal 'dor yang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /'jig rten phan 'dod ci phyir ston mi byed/ /nyi zla mkha' la rnam par rgyu 'dong
zhing / /phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi dong dag dang / /mtsho mtshe'u mtsho bran snod dang rin chen dang / /rgya mtsho chu klung rnams su gzugs brnyan ston/ /de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis
mi khyab pa/ /skyes bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun du ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dbang / /dang ba'i mtsho la yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag /

de dag so so rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong / /ral gri mda' chen gzhu dang mda' rnams dang / /go gyon bzhon dang theg par bcas su mthong / /gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad gang / /de dang de dag de ltar chu las mthong / /

'on kyang chu la byams sdang rnam rtog med/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan zhes bya ba/ /sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes rnams kyi/ /sgra yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas te/ /rang

gi skad kyis skad kun tshim par byed/ /sgra ldan chags sdang gti mug can de yang / /skad rnams kun gyi sgra yi tshul mkhas na/ /gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu mi byed/ /

tum bu ru yi chung ma dbyangs ldan ma/ /tshangs pa'i bu mo yid las byung ba de/ /bden dang dam bcas mi 'tshe dga' rnams kyi/ /sems dang yid dang kha yi sgor 'jug ste/ /dbyangs ldan chags can zhe sdang can de yang / /brtul

zhugs grub 'thun dbyangs kyi yan lag gis/ /yid 'ong skad kyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/ /ye shes yon tan phyug rnams cis mi byed/ /rig sngags tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs mang mtha'

yas ston par byed/ /nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang / /khyim bzang rgyas pa shin du mdzes pa ston/ /'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / /sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/ /bsam gtan mngon

shes rnam thar rab bslabs pa/ /spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/ /rgyal ldan lha yis lha min pham byas na/ /de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas bzhin bcas shing / /

theg bcas dmag bcas go gyon bzhin du 'byer/ /'dod chags sdang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang / /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' bo rnams/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci

phyir ston mi byed/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i glang po sa srung bu/ /dbang po'i 'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de/ /mgo bo sum bcu rtsa gsum mngon sprul cing / /mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/ /mche ba de dag so so re re la

'ang / /rdzing bu chus gang bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /rdzing re la 'ang pad ma sna tshogs pa/ /rnam par bkod pa bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /pad ma re re'ang lha yi bu mo dag /sgyu rtsal kun shes bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ /de dag rtsed mo glu

gar tshul la mkhas/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse/ /glang po de yang lus ni bsgyur byas te/ /lha rnams kun dang 'grogs shing 'dre bar byed/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun kyang 'thun/ /glang po mchog gi rnam

'phrul de ltar snang / /glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang / /'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/ /shes rab thabs kyi stobs la sbyangs ba rnams/ /ting 'dzin brgya yis rnam 'phrul cis mi byed/ /sgra gcan ji ltar

'dod bzhin lus 'phrul te/ /rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa 'jog byed cing / /rgya mtsho lte bar phyin pa tsam du ston/ /ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom/ /sgra gcan chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang / /'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston

byed na/ /'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams rab 'joms pa/ /rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci phyir ston mi byed/ /brgya byin rnam 'phrul bsam yas rab snang ste/ /lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /lha min byed pa 'phyes

pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus las sprul/ /lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis/ /brgya byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung ngo zhes/ /lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos

gyur/ /'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te/ /rdo rje me lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing / /lus la go bgos gzi brjid snyen dka' ba'i/ /brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer/ /de yang bsod nams phal

pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur pa/ /bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul/ /lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga/ /lha las rnam par smin

pas grub gyur pa/ /lha rnams bag med gnas par shes gyur nas/ /rnga de nam mkha' las ni sgra sgrogs te/ /'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther zug min/ /tha shal mi brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs

shing 'dra/ /srid pa thams cad rmi lam sprin dang mtshungs/ /bag med thams cad dgrar bcas mya ngan can/ /'chi ba'i lam yin mi 'chi lam ma yin/ /ji snyed su dag bag med gnas gyur pa/ /de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen
pos zin/ /sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad yin/ /skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyis smad/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyi yul la rmongs/ /chos kyi stobs la rtag dga' gyis zhes bskul/ /

rnga des bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang / /lha yi 'dun sa chos bzang 'dug nas su/ /gtam gang zhi zhing 'dod chags bral 'thun pa/ /chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la brjod/ /rnga de gzugs med bstan du mi rung yang / /

de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byed na/ /bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs ni yongs ston rnams/ /'gro ba kun gyi don chen cis mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis/ /

lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga/ /lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te/ /rnga yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing / /skrag pa med de stobs kyang skyes par gyur/ /lha min dbang po skrag pas nyen pa rnams/ /

'jigs nas dmag bcas de yi mod la 'byer/ /de ltar sgra skad 'byin pa'i rnga 'dra ba/ /'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen po/ /nyon rmongs bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams/ /zhi ba'i sgra bsgrags nyon mongs sel bar

byed/ /dbang po'i lha yi bu mo dgu bcu gnyis/ /dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur/ /gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes/ /gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/ /lha mo kun dang dga' bar gnas snang

yang / /chos bzang 'dun sa na yang de bzhin 'dug /lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing / /brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam par 'phrul/ /brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan pa yang / /sprul pas rang gi

'khor rnams dga' byed na/ /'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed/ /bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba/ /de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong / /las

dang nyon mongs kun du zhugs pa yis/ /so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud des bcings/ /chags sdang gti mug ldan pa'i bdud de yang / /'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur byed na/ /dbang bcu dbang thob rnams la ci

smos te/ /'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi 'jog /stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang / /stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na/ /de dag kun na 'dug par rab snang zhing / /tshangs pa'i sgra
dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrogs/ /tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /'jig rten rab 'das bla na med pa yi/ /bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cis mi

'phrul/ /dbang phyug chen po'i shes pa'i rnam 'phrul ltos/ /rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char thigs rab bkye ba/ /skad cig gcig la thams cad 'grang ba byed/ /thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma shes de med na/ /bslab pa
bskal pa bsam yas rab bslabs te/ /byang chub bla med ye shes thob pa rnams/ /ci phyir skad cig gcig la sems kyis ni/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems mi shes/ /sems can las smin bsam gyis mi

khyab pas/ /'jig rten 'di kun rlung las yongs su byung / /rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med khang / /rin chen rnam phye sa bon bkram pa'ang byung / /rlung las sprin byung char pa'ang kun du 'bab/ /rlung gis sprin kyang rab tu zhi

bar byed/ /'jig rten lo tog 'phel ba'ang rlung byed de/ /rlung ni 'gro ba kun la phan pa skyed/ /rlung de pha rol phyin la ma bslabs shing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la ma bslabs kyang / /'jig rten rnam smin bsam

yas ston byed na/ /dam pa thob rnams ci phyir ston mi byed/ /rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni/ /bya skad ri dgas skad dang skyes pa dang / /bud med bu mo khye'u skad ci snyed pa/ /kun gyi sgra snyan sems can rnams la

sgrogs/ /de ltar sgra snyan rang bzhin sgra shes nas/ /sgrib pa med pa'i spobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /'gro ba kun la sgra snyan brjod byas nas/ /yid 'ong sgra yis 'jig rten mgu bar byed/ /rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad

kyi chos/ /'gro kun rgya dang mtshungs pas rgya mtsho ste/ /chu dang 'byung po rin chen yong mi zad/ /chu rnams bzung bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med/ /de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgya 'dra ste/ /bsod nams bsam gtan rnam par

thar rnams dang / /shes rab ye shes yon tan kun mi zad/ /bsod nams yon tan sogs pas ngoms pa med/ /rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par rtse ba na/ /sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar/ /gling bzhi bcas par

sprin chen rgyas 'gengs te/ /de dag kun kyang sna tshogs bkod pa mang / /de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam gling gi/ /gser gyi mdog gi sprin rnams rnam par sgrub/ /'phrul dgar mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu/ /dga' ldan

gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog /'thab bral gnas su mthon mthing bai DUr+ya/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum rdo yi snying po 'dra/ /skyong ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu/ /rgya mtshor rdo rje mi phyed mkhregs 'dra ba/ /mi ci gnas su spos

mchog 'khrigs lta bu/ /klu yi gnas su pad ma'i mdog 'dra ba/ /gsang ba'i gnas su ngang pa bya gar mdog /lha min gnas su ri brag mdog 'dra ba/ /byang du gser gyi 'od zer mdog ston te/ /gling rnams gzhan du sna tshogs

bkod pa ston/ /'dzam bu'i gling du ri sngon 'dra ba ste/ /gang na ci mtho sprin rnams de bzhin no/ /dbang sgyur gnas su gser sprin nges bstan nas/ /nyi ma'i mdog 'dra glog kyang rab tu 'gyed/ /'phrul dga'i gnas su zla 'od bzang

'dra dang / /dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog 'dra/ /'thab bral gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog /sum bcu rtsa gsum gser gyi 'od zer 'dra/ /skyong ba'i gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /rgya mtshor mu tig dmar

po'i mdo 'dra bkod/ /mi ci gnas su mthon mthing bai dUr+ya/ /klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /gsang ba'i gnas su shel gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /lha min gnas su rdo yi snying po 'dra/ /byang du nor bu skar mdog kha dog

'dra/ /gling gzhan rnams su'ang bkod pa gzhan dang gzhan/ /'dzam bu'i gling du zla ba'i nor bu 'bar/ /sprin gyi mtshan nyid 'thun pa'i glog kyang 'gyed/ /de ni dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs sgra sgrogs/ /'phrul dga' gnas su rnga sgra

sgrog par byed/ /dga' ldan gnas su sil snyan rol mo'i sgra/ /'thab bral gnas su lha yi bu mo'i sgra/ /sum bcu gsum du mi ci mang po'i skad/ /skyong ba'i gnas su dri za'i skad du ste/ /rgya mtshor ri 'thab sgra skad 'dra ba'o/ /

mi ci gnas su gling bu ku lan sgra/ /klu yi gnas su ka la ping ka'i sgra/ /gsang ba'i gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra/ /lha min gnas su lha yi rdza rnga'i sgra/ /mi yi gnas su rgya mtsho gling bu'i sgra/ /de ni dbang sgyur gnas su lha spos

zhim/ /me tog sna tshogs bkod pa'i char yang 'bebs/ /'phrul dgar zla ba zla bzangs 'dra ba yi/ /me tog man dAr phreng dang byug pa 'bebs/ /dga' ldan gnas su nor bu chen po'i mdog /rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs

dang / /gtsug gi nor bu zla ba 'dra ba dang / /gser mdog 'dra ba'i dar la'i char yang 'bebs/ /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan sna tshogs dang / /phreng ba rnams dang rgyan dang byug pa dang / /mu tig dmar dang gser dang dar la dang / /sil

snyan yid 'ong 'thab bral gnas su 'bebs/ /sum bcu gsum du yid sbyin nor bu mchog /skyong ba'i gnas su tsan dan snying po'i mchog /gur gum sil ma lha shing ta ma la/ /spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog rab tu 'bebs/ /

skyong ba'i gnas su klu yi dbang po de/ /nyam stobs skye ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams/ /kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang / /de min rin chen bsam yas char yang 'bebs/ /de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du yang / /char rgyun mi 'chad gnya'

shing tsam dag dang / /rnam rgyal chen po mdzod rnams mi zad pa/ /mi ci gnas su rgyan phreng sna tshogs dang / /pad ma uta pal ras dang rin chen dang / /me tog bar sha ma li phye ma spos/ /pi bang gling bu sgra snyan rdza rnga 'bebs/ /klu yi gnas

su mu tig dmar po ste/ /gsang bar nor bu rin chen skar mdog 'dra/ /lha min gnas su ral gri mda' chen dang / /dgrar 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char pa 'bebs/ /byang du de ni rgyal phreng rin chen dang / /me tog bar sha ma li tsam pa'i

phreng / /ku ran gtsang dang a ti mug ta 'bebs/ /gling gzhan rnams su'ang sna tshogs char pa 'bebs/ /'dzam bu'i gling du chu gsal dang ba yi/ /char rnams chos bzhin phra ba'i rgyun du 'bebs/ /me tog 'bras bu sman dang

spos dang shing / /lo tog bde byed 'jig rten rnams su skyed/ /de ltar sprin bkod bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /glog 'byin 'brug sgrogs bkod pa'i char 'bebs kyang / /gnas nas mi g.yo rnam par rtog pa med/ /klu yi rnam

'phrul de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /rgya mtsho'i chu na gnas pa de ltar yang / /klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan phyug /rnam 'phrul bsam yas ci phyir ston mi byed/ /bag tsam

smos pa'i dpe tshul 'di dag gis/ /skyes chen de dag rnams kyi brjod pa byas/ /dpa' bo de dag dpe rnams kun dang bral/ /de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang bsgyur ro/ /blo gros dam pa blo gros rgya chen ldan/ /ma nor blo gros mtha' yas

blo gros can/ /ye shes mchog ldan khyad par blo can gyi/ /rnam thar mchog rnams 'di lta rnams kyis bshad/ /rnam thar dam pa 'di dag sus thos nas/ /yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog byed pa/ /de dag ngo mtshar rmad byung chos

ldan te/ /de dag dga' byed mi yi 'jig rten na/ /'di 'dra'i chos 'dir gang dag dad gyur pa/ /sems can so so'i skye bo'i tshogs na dkon/ /gang dag dge bsags bsod nams byas gyur pa/ /de dag rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la dad/ /

gang dag nyan thos theg pa'ang yid ches pa'i/ /mi dag mi yi 'jig rten rnams na nyung / /de bas rkyen gyi theg par rab tu nyung / /theg pa chen por de dag de bas nyung / /theg pa che la zhugs pa de dkon te/ /gang dag chos 'dir dad pa'ang rab

dkon na/ /'jug cing 'dzin pa smos kyang ci dgos te/ /gang dag de bzhin bsgrub pa smos ci dgos/ /gang dag stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /phyi ma'i bskal par mgo bos 'deg byed kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka'

ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin/ /la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can la/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med/ /

la la zhing bcu ri dang rgya mtshor bcas/ /lag pa'i mthil du bskal par mkhar 'dzin kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bya dka' ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra de ni de la yod ma yin/ /la las zhing bcu rdul snyed sems can la/ /dge ba kun

gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang / /chos 'dir dad pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /bsod nams khyad par de 'dra de la med/ /la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur bas/ /

gang gis chos kyi le'u 'di gzung byas pa/ /bsod nams de ni de bas khyad par 'phags/ /rnam thar de dag rab tu bstan pa'i tshe/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur/ /bdud kyi gnas rnams mog

mog byas gyur cing / /sgra rab phyung bas ngan song rab tu zhi/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge rnams/ /de dag kun gyis mngon bar zhal bstan te/ /phyag brkyang mdzad nas yon tan mtha' yas pa/ /bzang po dpal gyi mgo la

bzhag par gyur/ /phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de/ /rnam thar 'di dag legs par bshad pa legs/ /khyod kyis legs bstan rjes su nged dgyes zhes/ /sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis gsung brjod do/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag 'khod pa'i lha thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de

dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas 'di legs par bka' stsal to/ /kye ma de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa 'di mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa 'di sngon ma thos so/ /sems can gang dag chos

kyi rnam grangs 'di rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag ni shin du dkon te/ sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /sems can de

dag ni lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la mchod rten lta bur 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/ /rab tu byung ba rnams sam/ khyim na gnas pa rnams

sam/ de bzhin du rgyal po rnams sam/ blon po chen po rnams sam/ khyim bdag rnams kyis gtse bar mi nus so zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mdo sde dkon mchog 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' ba lags te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos 'di lta bu ni 'jig rten du byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs

pa'i mthu nyid kyis sems can de dag gis kyang thos lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung
shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di gzung lags te/ slan chad mi bskyud par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / byang chub sems dpa'

'phags pa kun du bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen

gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ skar zhus/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+nyA nolkA nA ma d+hA ra NI sarba ga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la la
zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs

kyi dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zla ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma
gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ga la ba der song nas/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa rnams

dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa dag gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod pa yang mthong ngo / /de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis gcig la gcig sems te/ ji ltar byas na bdag
cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams las sems can thams cad la snang ba sbyin pa dang / mun pa mun nag bsal ba'i phyir shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcur
khyab pa'i blo can zhes bya ba gang gi mthus bdag cag sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa thob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis

lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal pa/ s+yAd ya the dan/

tsak+Shu shu ra dang / tsak+Shu shu b+ha/ d+hu la me thA ka lang tha/ id tid than sa/ sU rad Ta/ sU rad Ta/ sud thA ya/ id than sa/ be lA be lA/ pa Ni tsa ru mUrti ni/ A ra Ni/ A ra Ni/ kA la pa Ni/ kA la pa Ni/ tu ru du si/ tu ru du si/ d+ha su te/

d+ha su ti/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ kA la kA la/ sad thA sa/ gI la gI la/ gI la pa ya/ gI la pa ya/ d+hu su d+hu su/ sun d+hu sun d+hu/ sid thA su/ ad thA su/ e thA su/ e thA sA pA ni/ yu tsu re d+he/ su d+ha re/

ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ kurma kurma/ kurma pa Ni/ kurma pa Ni/ ke lu ke lu/ ke la pa ni/ ke la pa ni/ karkA ri/ karkA ri/ la ru bud+d+ha/ d+hu ru d+he/ d+hu ru d+he/ ma hA d+hu ru d+he/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/

pi hu si/ pi hu si/ d+ha su d+ha su/ ha su ha su/ ha su pa ni swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma rigs kyi bu dag gzungs

sngags 'di ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis gsungs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu dag u dum ba ra'i me tog ni ches rnyed par sla'i/

gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni ches rnyed par sla'i/ 'di dag ni 'chang ba'am klog pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu

dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni ches rnyed par sla'i/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag gal te sems can mnar med pa na 'khod pa bskal par gnas pa/

mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa/ dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/ de'i tshe

gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi mthus sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa kha brgyar 'gyes par 'gyur la/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar bar 'gyur na 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams lta ci smos te/ gang dag

gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag gis ni bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po rnams dang / zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyis yongs su zin pa yin no snyam du shes

pa kho nar bya ste/ 'di la som nyi'am yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ d+hu na Ti/ d+hu na Ti/ ma hA d+hu na Ti/ su ru su ru swA hA/ shu kla bi sho d+ha ni/ ta ra ta ra swA hA/ dzo tish+p+ra dI pe/ tu ru tu ru swA hA/ pad ma mA li ni/ sat+ya

ta ra bud+d+hi/ hu ru hu ru swA hA/ sat+ya bud+d+hi/ sat+ya a ba lo ki ni/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri swA hA/ d+ha ra na bu Ti/ a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ lak+Sha na tsi te/ d+hU ma pa ri ha re/ hu ru hu ru/ khu ru khu ru swA hA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/

mA d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra yan ti ye swA hA/ su pra ti/ su ma te/ a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra yan ti ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /swA hA/ /'phags

pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rdzogs so// //skar/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags

pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan

du yod pa na 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med za sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang
thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig

yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin du rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ tshe 'dzin cing mthar phyin par

gzhes te/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni tshe thung ba las tshe lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher dus ma

yin par 'chi bar bstan to/ /'jam dpal sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger

'drir 'jug gam/ ming tsam yang nyan tam klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang bar byed dam/ me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las

tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal sems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin du rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang 'phel bar 'gyur

ro/ /sems can gang dag tshe zad kar mtshan 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs

pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan nam/ yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de dag gi yon tan dang legs par 'gyur ba ni 'di dag go/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi

ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa~M skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he
ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang

ngam klog par gyur pa de'i tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu

med pa sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te samyaka sa~M bu d+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa

ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa~M skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig

dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te A pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te sa~M myag sa~M bud+d+hA ya/

hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/ /oM mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta a yur

gnod sbyin dang srin pos glags bltas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a

sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang thams cad skyob dang log par dad sel dang gser thub dang 'od srung dang shAkya thub pa

la sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /

oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa~M skA ra

pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam spungs te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med

pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa

ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa~M skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i

thigs pa ni re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te samyaka sa~M

bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa~M skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu

med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ sti stang du byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod

pa byas pa yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar ha te samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro

pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa~M skA ra pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ges sbyin pa'i stobs
rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ges tshul khrims stobs
rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ges bzod pa'i
stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ges brtson
'grus stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ges bsam
gtan stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /shes rab stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ges shes

rab stobs rtogs te/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni ta te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya

ar ha te samyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sarba sa~M skA ri pa ri shud d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he

ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar
bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags pa tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs so// //oM gcig pa dang

gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang gsum yod pa las/ oM gsum pa 'di dag pa yin te/ 'di la tshe dpag med mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes zer ro/ /'di la yi ge brgya rtsa bcu yod pa ni klog pa'i ched du a gnyis dkyus su bcug pa yin no/ /'di rgya dpe dngos la

bris so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya A pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gA tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge

'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/ /de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na/ /de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur/ /

'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong / /de na bud med yod ma yin/ /mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin/ /rin chen rnams kyi pad mo las/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zas dang
gos dang sman rnams dang / /chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams/ /sems kyi bsams ma thag tu ni/ /de dag mod la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba can gyi
bsngags pa brjod/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la dad byas na/ /rnam par smin pa bsam mi khyab/ /

rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de/

rgyal rigs su skyes so/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /de'i yum ni

gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i btsun mo ni rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /rim gro pa ni snyan pa dri ma

med ces bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog dang brtson 'grus chen po dang

ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /lha byin gyi ming ni dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag
de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do/ /dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi

mtshan legs par bzung la/ zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma yengs par bsgom zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /dpal
'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lag lngas phyag byas la/ sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag

med bsams na zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams

cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du

skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ sha ba le/ a ba le/ sa ma dza le/ nir de she/ nir dza te/ ni rug te/ nir mu khe/ dz+wa la pa ri tshe da ni/ su kha ba ti nir de she/ a mi

te/ A yu gar b+ha nir hA ni/ a mri ti A yur pra sa da ni/ nir bud+d+hi A kA sha nir de she/ A kA sha ni rdza ti/ A kA sha nir ku sha le/ A kA sha ni dar shA ne/ A kA sha a d+hiSh+ThA ne/ su kha ba ti a d+hi Sh+ThA ne rU pa nir de she/ tsa twA ri d+harma pra sA da ne/

tsa twa ri Ar+ya sat+ya pra sA da ni/ tsa twa ri mArka b+ha na pra sA da ni ba la bir+ya pra sA da ne/ d+harmA tshe da ni/ ku sha le/ ku sha la nir de sha /ku sha la pra tiSh+ThA ne/ bud+d+hA ku sha le/ bi shud d+ha pra b+ha/ sa d+harma ka ra ni/ nirdza ti/ nir bud+d+he/ bi ma le/ bi ra dze/

rA dzA sa/ ra sa gre/ ra sA gra pa le/ ra sA gra/ a d+hi te/ ku le pra ti ku le/ bi ku le/ d+han te te su d+han ta tsid te/ su pra shan ta tsid te/ su pra ti te/ su le su mu khI/ d+harme tsa d+harme/ ba le tsa ba le/ a nu sha a ba le/ bud+d+ha A

A kA shA guN bud+d+ha/ A kA shA nir gu Ni/ a mr-i ta du b+hi: swa re swA hA/ dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du

kha ton byed pa des/ gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang spos kyis mchod pa bya'o/ /byang chub kyi snying po'i pad ma'i gnas dang / byang chub

kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la bya'o/ /de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par bya ste/ 'dod pa dang dad pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag

de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /pad ma'i gdan ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can

zhes bya ste/ rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs so/ /g.yas na ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ /g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub

sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor to/ /dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang dad pa dang gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur te/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma chen

po dag la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen pha 'am dge bsnyen ma gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de

la me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / sngon gyi las kyi rnam

par smin pa ni gang la yang ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pu N+ya swa b+ha wa dang / lo ts+tsha ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis

bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pa ri mi ta gu Na a a nu shang sA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a mi ta b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar ha te/ sa~Mmyaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a m-i te/ a m-i tod b+hA be/ a m-i ta sa~M b+ha be a m-i ta b-i kran te/ a m-i ta ga mi ni/

ga ga na kir ti ka re/ sarba kle sha k+Sha ya~M ka rI swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du

bzlas brjod byas na sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas stong gis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /
lan 'bum bzlas brjod na 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de

bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phan yon gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yod na yang mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin no/ /'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//

// @#// //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sab ta bud+d+hi kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'

lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun du bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la

sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas/ brdol zhing gcer bu gos med

la lag pa bgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das

ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang / dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la lag pa bstod pa cig

shos 'di yang su zhig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /cig shos

'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po thams cad zlog

pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas bdun sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo / /bdun pa ni bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po

thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha la ha la/ hi la hi lA ya/ na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa

rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed

na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /zas dang

skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs

mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/ /mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang / ud pal sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i
mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don

dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ \u0f00 pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa pA ya/

sarba b+hU ta nAn/ tsin da ya/ kI la ya/ pa ra bid+ya nAn swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bsgom nyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams

cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di

nyin mtshan gsum yid la byed na/ de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di nas

shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa la gna' ma'i mar la bzlas brjod

byas te sbyin no/ /chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /skud pas bdag la bsrung ngo / /byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so/ /mtshan btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rang

gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog

pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ \u0f00 ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku lod sA d+ha na nA~M ku ru sarba gra ha NA~M swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po gsang

sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang
sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims

nad kyis mi 'debs shing / chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs so/ /dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen

ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog

mar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o/ /'thab pa dang thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so/ /mi nad la shing

'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/ /dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la btags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /rA dzA nAn rA dzA mA tram bA ba shi ka ra tu kA me na/

'o ma can gyi shing gis me sbar te bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa sbyang zhing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par

'dod na 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod

pas shu ti dang / nal dang khre dang shi ri sha dang rgya spos dang gum kum dang gla sgang dang in+d+rA ba ru na dang byang chub kyi shing dang a mra'i mgo thogs dang 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba

bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying pos lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o/ /dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i

lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin bsreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /gdon dang bsrung ba dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i

phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na maHkra kud tshan dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar ha te sa myaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ka Tha ka Tha/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ki Thi ki Thi/ ki Ta pa ya

na maHswA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel zhes bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig /blangs shing

bzung ste/ kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dag gis mchod pa byas

nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'byong bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /yang

na cho ga bzhin du sgrub na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /

zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /lhog rgal gcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o/ /

'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcing pa thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste de bzhin gshegs

pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs

pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la ci smos pa de thams cad ston to/ /tshe 'am stobs sam pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams

cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na ma ka na ka mu na ye/

ta thA ga tA ya/ ar ha te sa~M myaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri si ri si ri/ si rA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma d+hu ma d+hu mA ya/ na mo na ma/ ka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar ha te sa~M

myaka sa~M bud swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod

byed pa de la mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang chu dang lce 'babs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par
mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /

dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la gza'

thams cad la khrus bya'o/ /mdze dang skrangs nad dang mchin skran la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la bskus na mdze nad thams cad

sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan btab

pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na rjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de las thams cad pa zhes bya'o/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka'

stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ oM ha ra ha ra ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te/ sa~M myaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ si d+h+yan tu man tra pA da swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od

srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis

gsungs pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo 'am/ mtshan mo lan gsum gsum zlas rjod byed

na mdor na rmi lam na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdze dang sha ga ra

la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/ /klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas

kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems

can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me/ ma hA g+hu me/ ta le ta le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le

tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re/ ma hA d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi li mi li/ ma hA mi li/ ti li ti li/ ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA d+hu me/

tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ /nam mkha'i snying po klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/ /sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas bya'o/ /dug spo na chus bya'o/ /las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/ /khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/ /

cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dwa da sha bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis
stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing

'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/

de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad ma bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku

dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings

las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /su rgyal ba de'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi
rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go/ /des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dra ba med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas nam mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad ma bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan

pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos

nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs

pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog pad ma gser sdug nam mkha'

lta bu'i sku ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur

ro/ /shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa thams cad dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /tshig gdon to/ /phyag bya'o/ /lho phyogs kyi de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /yid la bya'o/ /nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags

ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag kyang bya'o/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag kyang bya'o/ /

nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs shes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral bag tsha mi

mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin
gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byams pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya/

sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /'on kyang sdig pa thams cad zad

par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge

'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum

tshogs pa yang myur du yongs su 'dzin to/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe yang kun du mdzes pa dang / de'i longs

spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / ris 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin

to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa yi/ /tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad du/ /mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang / /'od byed pa dang mthu chen dang / /'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /gzungs kyi gsang

sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a khe ma khe/ sa man ta mu khe/ sau ti yug te/ ni rug te/ pra b+he sa ma yo ge/ tsid ta tsid ta rte/ a khe/ ma khe/ ma da ne/ bi brte/ sa man ta gu Ni/ sa t+yA ra me/

yug te pra yug te/ yug te/ hi li mi li/ ma sa le/ A na le/ tsa me/ a tsi te/ tso tse/ a ra he/ ba hud tshe/ ma yu gra he/ he ma ba ti/ dz+yo ti ba ti/ d+harma tsing te/ ts+yu ta pang ge/ a bi k+She be/ ra d+h+ri k+She me/ skan d+ha bi ba ga

te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzungs 'di dag ni gzung

byas na/ /phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa/ /bye ba drug bcu'i drang srong rnams/ /de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur/ /skye ba dag ni kun du yang / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/ /cung zad dge ba gang yin pa/ /

don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ /pad ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon sum mthong / /gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa/ /mkhas pa dpal ldan rdzus te skye/ /dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dang / /

mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel/ /thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/ /thos pa thams cad 'dzin ma nyams/ /'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ /mtshan rnams su zhig rjod byed pa/ /ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni/ /

bzang 'gror myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog /de dag de la mngon bar 'gyur/ /byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya/ /zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag /gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs

rnams kyi/ /mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi/ /bsod nams phung po de ches mang / /rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes rnyed/ /

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ /dad pa bla na med pa 'thob/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing / /mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de/ /mthong nas ston la rab tu dang / /'jig rten sgron ma

mthong nas ni/ /mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su/ /byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya/ /nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni/ /

mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na/ /gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i/ /rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/ /mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa/ /skye ba gang dang gar skyes par/ /

de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /bkur ste ma yin thob mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /de la

bskal pa du mar ni/ /lha rnams sti stang byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub myur du mtshang yang rgya/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /mos med shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur/ /g.yo dang sgyu ni rnam par spangs/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas

rnams kyang mthong / /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /lha dang dri za klu dbang dang / /mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa/ /rtag tu de la bsrung bar byed/ /gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/ /nor chen khyim du

skye bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la sbyin par byed/ /dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya mang por/ /lha yi tsan dan dmar po dang / /shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi/ /spos ngad de yi kha nas 'byung / /mtshan

rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /rin chen sna bdun pad ma 'dab/ /bye ba stong phrag

mang yod las/ /'byor chen de skye lha gzugs ldan/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de ni pha ma spun sdug dang / /skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang / /'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo / /drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan/ /

bud med kyis ni gzung byas na/ /bud med lus la ma chags nas/ /skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur/ /mi yi lus ni thob gyur nas/ /bla med byang chub thob 'gyur te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /'dod pa zhi bzhin mya ngan

'da'/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de yi lus la mtshon dang ni/ /dug dang me dang rgyal po dang / /g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de yi sems la nams kyang ni/ /dpung dang

bzhon par bcas pa yi/ /bdud gyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams/ /mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de/ /zhing ni bya ba bsam yas par/ /nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod

nas/ /'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu/ /de dag de yi bsam mkhyen nas/ /rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las/ /lung bstan pa ni thob gyur nas/ /de ni shin du yi rangs te/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la the tshom med/ /

mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni/ /zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te/ /thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol phyin sa dang / /mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang / /mtshan

dang dpe byad bzang po rnams/ /ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni/ /gang gi zhing du 'dod gyur pa/ /der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs/ /byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /skyes pa 'am ni

bud med gang / /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi/ /yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang / /sangs rgyas bskal par rgyun du gsung / /bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni/ /yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas/ /rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po/ /sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog /'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ /mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang / /gang dag 'di

rnams mtshan nyan cing / /thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba/ /de dang de dag shes rab che/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /drang srong chen po de dag gi/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas/ /bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur

la/ /shes rab ldan pa su mi 'dzin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang

ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i

mdo rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ skar// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud+d+ha hri dA

ya nA ma d+hA ra NI d+harma pa r+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chos kyi dbye dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ ye shes kyi rnam par dpyad pa/ sngon sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can

thams cad kyis mngon bar bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa/ kun nas 'od kyi khang bzangs kyi dbus na

byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/

thams cad kyang gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i

'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang

la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/ lhag pa'i bsam

pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin

gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir bsnyil bar

'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la

'byung po'i tshogs thams cad srung bar 'gyur/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis

mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug bcil nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed

par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngang bar 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de la

'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshig chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he

su bud+d+he/ ma hA bud+d+he/ i hA bud+d+he/ tad tra bud+d+he/ bud+d+he/ bud+d+he/ ma ti/ bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu ma ti/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu dz+nyA na te/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/

bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mod kyi/ gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor na bsgom pa'o/ /gzungs 'di ni sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ shud+d+he/ su shud+d+he/ su shud+d+he/ sho d+ha ni/ sa~M ni rma le/ ma la a pa ga te/ ga ti sa ma d+hi d+hi tran ti/ kra me sa ma sa re/ sa rA sa ra pa ri a sho

ke/ bi sho ka /sho ka sha ma ni/ shan te/ u pa shan te/ pra shan te/ a ba b+hA se/ sarba pu N+ye pa ri maN ti te/ sarba d+harma pra ti maN ti te/ ha ra ha ra/ ma la ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa~M tsa ra/ tsa la tsa la sa~M tsa la/ ta la ta la/ ma ta la sa ma ta la/

ri ne ri ne/ su mi ni/ ni ne/ sa ma ri ne/ ri na ma ti/ lo ka d+ha re/ lo ka d+ha ri Ne/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ Da ra Da ra/ ro d+ha ro d+ha/ ma hA bi dza ya/ bA hi ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba bud+d+he/ hri phre shi/ tra si/ sarba dz+nyA pa the/ sarba dz+nyA pa ra mi te/ ma hA pra ti b+ha na sa~M/ phan ne/

sa man ta/ a lo ke bud+d+ha/ bi sha ye/ bud+d+ha/ pra ti maN Di te/ b+ha ga ba te sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ pra sa ra sarba sho sha a pa ga te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas su bcas pa dang / tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa yang g.yos so/ rab tu g.yos so/ kun du rab tu g.yos so/ /rgya

mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs so/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg cing 'gul to/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad skrag nas/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / bdud sdig can

rnams shin du sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyams thag go/ /sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/ /lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon bar dad pa de dag gis lha'i ma

tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon bar gtor nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya seng ge

yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi/ /gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yi/ /skad cig yud der sa yang rnam drug g.yos/ /rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing

bdud kyi gnas kun kyang / rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi ris rnams kyi/ /lha dag rab tu dngangs shing 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /bdud yid mi bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non/ /de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos nas/ /'jig rten

mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /nam mkhar gnas nas me tog man dA 'thor/ /gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dad gzhan rnams kyi/ /se mo do dang do shal spos rnams dang / /phye ma dag dang byug pa gos rnams dang / /

rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / thos pa thams cad yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms
