pas brjod par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas/ /thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa/ /'khor ba 'dir ni nam du yang / /bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang / /mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa/ /gzungs la gnas pas thob

par 'gyur/ /gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang / /thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo/ /gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i/ /bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ /tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par gyis/ /nyon mongs

zad par bya ba la/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'dis chog /sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang / /sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa/ /gang gis thos nas de spong ba/ /nga yi mngon sum 'byor bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing / /

snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya/ /gzungs mchog 'di yi mthu stobs kyis/ /sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang / /tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa/ /dag 'gyur

'di la the tshom med/ /yar gyi ngo ni tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin tshes ni bcwa lnga la/ /bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs la/ /cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod/ /de nas rmongs pa med par yang / /nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing / /shin tu

thub dka' dpe med pa/ /nyes pa zlog pa'i gzungs brjod na/ /thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od/ /'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur/ /des na tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur/ /'od dpag med la mnga' ba yi/ /

yon tan mtha' yas rab rgyas pa/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du yang / /mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshig /dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis/ /thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa/ /bcom ldan

'das la 'bul bar byed/ /rdo rje ral gri la sogs pa/ /lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang / ri bo ti se'i ri rab la/ /gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na/ /'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang

rnams dang / /ma la ya yi ri bo la/ /gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang / /khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa/ /lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni/ /lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams/ /

nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang / /rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus/ /rab tu bskyod de langs nas ni/ /sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /kun gyis sa yi dbang phyug po/ /thub mchog dam pa de

la ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /mnyam nyid chos te de bzhin nyid/ /shin du rtogs pa lam me ba/ /dul ba brtan pa dri ma sel/ /dri ma med pa skyon bral ba/ /thub pa sangs rgyas shin du zhi/ /'jig rten mgon po skye dgu

'i bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul/ /de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba/ /ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste/ /sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral/ /'jig rten mgon mdzad snang mdzad pa/ /dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras/ /nyon mongs

rab bcom phan 'dogs pa/ /ston pa po ste dri ma sel/ /spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba/ /zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan/ /brtsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal/ /mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa/ /zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang

bral/ /bcings pa las grol nges par grol/ /'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med/ /ngan song sel ba dpal dang ldan/ /dpal mdzad de bzhin phan pa mdzad/ /mnyam pa med pa dpe med pa/ /

khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong / /khengs pa med pa dman pa med/ /mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam/ /snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med/ /'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ /

'jig rten kun la phan par brtson/ /dpa' bo zhi ba zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad/ /mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba/ /sems can kun gyi 'khra sa lags/ /don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan/ /
rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'/ /skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa/ /dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa mad/ /gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis
mtshan mnga' ba/ /chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags/ /dpe byad bzang po bkod pa yis/ /spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston/ /dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po/ /de bzhin des pa bde sbyin pa/ /mthu

can yangs pa rgya che ba/ /bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa/ /brtson chen spro ba che ba ste/ /dgyes pa chen po stobs po che/ /mthu brnyes brtan po chen po ste/ /gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags/ /gsal

ba gsung ldan dpe med pa/ /dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal/ /rab tu zhi ba mun pa med/ /blo gros chen po chos 'dzin pa/ /phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes/ /'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa/ /dpal mdzad dpal
mnga' dpal dang ldan/ /dpal gyis longs spyod shin tu rgyas/ /bcom ldan legs bsgos bsgo bar mdzad/ /gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis

mtshan dpag med/ /rab tu dgyes pa longs spyod gsal/ /gzhi bcas sems pa mnyam pa lags/ /blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs/ /gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste/ /rgyas par longs spyod dri ma med/ /thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan

mnga' ba/ /skal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs/ /de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel/ /dri med skyon bral longs spyod can/ /sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes/ /sku bzang dge ba'i rim pa mchog /thugs rje'i

'od ldan 'od bzang ba/ /mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags/ /chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas/ /rjed 'os mchog gnas longs spyod che/ /nam mkha' mtshan te rnam dag blo/ /rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa/ /khyu mchog che spyan

ba rdzi ma/ /rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste/ /'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das/ /dag par longs spyod bstan pa can/ /sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod/ /pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'/ /ting

'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa/ /rnam thar sgo la mngon sum pa/ /gtong ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul las 'das/ /spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ /byang chub

sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal/ /dam pa'i don te tshul che ba/ /shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la/ /sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes/ /rigs chen 'thun par skyes pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas/ /khyad par

brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes/ /mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa/ /nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/ /dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa/ /gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin/ /blo rgya che ba thams

cad mkhyen/ /thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan/ /dkon pa bde bar thob 'gyur ba/ /mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan/ /'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon/ /zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam

yas yul/ /dpe med pa ste dper bya ba/ /'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan/ /legs gsung blo yi stobs kyis 'byung / /mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa/ /rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /gsung ba chen po ye shes che/ /

gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste/ /mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das/ /bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po/ /sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste/ /shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba/ /kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can/ /'jig rten

dbang 'das spyod yul ba/ /kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste/ /thabs mnga' phun sum tshogs ldan pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan/ /chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po/ /rab ston yon tan sgyur mdzad pa/ /spyod pa ma
lus 'dul bar mdzad/ /yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag /sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas/ /bgegs med ma legs byed pa bcom/ /bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad/ /g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal

ba brnyes/ /dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs/ /theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs/ /blo chen rgal bar dka' ba yi/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa mchog la longs

spyod pa/ /nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bur gnas/ /gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen/ /khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs/ /bde 'byung sa dang zhing

rnams kyi/ /mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod/ /sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /de la lha sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /phyag byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas

dkyil 'khor chen po na/ /gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod/ /thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/ /langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos/ /dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du/ /skad ber chen pos yongs bkang nas/ /nor bu'i rgyan ni

rnam g.yo zhing / /ha ha grags pa'i sgra sgrogs te/ /kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa/ /byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod/ /kye ma rnyed dang

bde 'byung ba/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang / /gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod/ /'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa/ /bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni/ /sgrib dang kun nas nyon

mongs dang / /sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/ /sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing / /nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong / /shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /de ni longs spyod chen po dang / /

bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur/ /de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ /blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/ /yon tan mtha' yas sras de la/ /bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis/ /mngon

sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste/ /nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms/ /'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs/ /gzhan gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang

ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa/ /de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de/ /sems can kun la bde 'dod pa/ /lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas/ /ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur na/ /'chang sogs

lta la ci zhig smos/ /de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la/ /gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis/ /yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs/ /mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang

bton na ni/ /de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la/ /gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur/ /'di ni yon tan kun gyi spos/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa/ /kun mkhyen bla med 'bras bu'i mchog /bde 'byung thob par byed pa

yin/ /'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung / /thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med/ /kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas/ /dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ni dge zhing 'bras bur ldan/ /sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin/ /

yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan/ /snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa/ /'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo/ /'jig rten kun nas dga' ba ste/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde 'byung ba/ /'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med/ /ston pa sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas

pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maH sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi sa twa nA~M/ sa man ta a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta sha sa na nA~M/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi

satwA ya/ badzra satwA ya/ badzra bi pu lA ya/ pad ma sam b+ha bA ya/ pad ma yo na ye/ tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 hrI ka ra/ shrI ka ra/ pra b+ha ka ra/ badzra satwa/ badzra sam b+ha ba/ pad ma sam b+ha ba/ pad ma sA ga ra/ pad ma go tsa

ra/ ba ra d+ha ma hA kA ru Ni ka /kA ru Ni sam b+ha ba/ hU~M hU~M/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shud d+ha satwa swA hA/ de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa

brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i phung po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas 'byung

ba'i chos bstan pa legs so legs so/ /'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa'o/ /gang la la nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa des ni yon tan

phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing 'jig rten gsum po kun tu rgyas ko lta ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa

dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyug dpa' bo rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas

mngon bar bstod pa/ sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /srid gsum ma lus yon tan chen po'i bdag /dri med skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/ /rab dga' rab dgyes
rab tu ston pa po/ /bskal pa bzang po rnam thar zhi ba'i mchog /shin tu rnam dag yon tan chen po'i bdag /rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod/ /rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa/ /mchog sbyin

'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes/ /dpag med pas kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung / /skyabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing gsal bar mdzad/ /nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba/ /srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad ma'i spyan/ /thos pa'i

rgya mtsho sems can kun bas dpa'/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog /snyan cha 'gul zhing pad ma dag pa bsnams/ /dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tshugs can/ /tshul bzang yon tan rkyen du

'tsham pa'i gzugs/ /'jig pa'i rlung chen 'tshub pa'i mtshon cha can/ /dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu/ /tshul gyi longs spyod bde chen mchog gi rgyu/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi spyod yul rgyu gcig pa/ /srid
gsum sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te sdig med pa/ /gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sa brnyes 'od zer rgyas pa

rgyan phreng mnga'/ /chen po'i che ba thog ma med pa ste/ /snga ma mun pa bsal cing nyon mongs med/ /dge ba dag pa spyod yul rnam par dag /tshul gyis dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag /srid gsum dbang phyug

pad ma las byung ba/ /srid gsum bde can yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste/ /dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rab mchog yangs/ /nor bu'i rgyan gyi rdo rje rgyan du thogs/ /pad

mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba/ /dge snod yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa/ /bde la longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag /smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste/ /'gro ba srid par lhung ba grol mdzad pa/ /sa dang
mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad/ /skal bzang bskal pa stong gi snang ba po/ /rdo rje mchog gis sgeg pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /yon tan rnam grags khyab par dkyil 'khor ba/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa'

bo'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can/ /cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan/ /lha chen brgya mnga' sum bcu gsum bdag dbang / /lha dang lha min dbang byas rnams kyis btud/ /

brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'/ /bsod nams brgya mnga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba/ /pad ma brgya pa pad ma nyid las byung / /dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste/ /chos brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po/ /

sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa/ /bskal pa rab 'byam mang por mkhas pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po/ /rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /

rab dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thod/ /na bza' dar dkar la banabs 'od mdzad pa/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa las/ /cha phrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes/ /dpa' bo nyi ma'i 'od

zer brgya mnga' ba/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing / /nyi mas kha phye pad ma mchog bsnams pa/ /me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i lha zhes grags/ /gtsug pud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag /btsun

rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes/ /rang gi rigs gsal dbang chen dkyil 'khor ba/ /pad ma bzang po'i rigs mchog thig les mtshan/ /spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa/ /gsang sngags mang po

'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po/ /tshogs chen mdun ma 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags/ /spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa/ /ka la ping ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul/ /mda' dang ru gzhu stobs chen mtshon
cha bsnams/ /stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul/ /rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste/ /rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod/ /tshogs mchod dag byed rnams kyis rab bstod

pa/ /chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las rab grol mdzad/ /gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab sbyin pa/ /lha yul 'gro ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can/ /mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'/ /stabs
gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan/ /'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs/ /sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes/ /nyon mongs
rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste/ /rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can/ /don dang tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba/ /theg pa bzang po 'dzin

pa'i nyi ma lags/ /dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes/ /skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom/ /blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po/ /bde ldan gos rgyan yang ba sna tshogs can/ /bcom ldan 'byung
ba'i 'jigs pa med par mdzad/ /rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo/ /bde ba longs spyod cher 'byung dri ma med/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri
med pa/ /mi dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog /'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po/ /stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags/ /sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin
chen mtshungs/ /dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'/ /khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs/ /khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba/ /rdo rje sems
mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa/ /thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs/ /spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /

de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba/ /rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa/ /mchog chen rdo rje glu la bstod pa yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs pa mang / /ji ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod/ /

spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni bstod byed pa/ /des ni ring por mi thogs yon tan gyi/ /longs spyod mchog chen chos ni thob par 'gyur/ /mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod pa/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang dam pa sbyin
par byed/ /sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob/ /de ni sdig pa'i dri mas mi gos te/ /lam srang bzang por dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur/ /srid gsum skyabs 'os

gcig pu pad ma skyes/ /de 'drar chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur/ /de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing / /gang zhig rtag tu bde ba 'dod pa yis/ /'gro kun skye rgu'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs/ /pad ma las byung rtag tu bstod
par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// //'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa

gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai ye da d+h+wi kA nA~M/ sarba ta thA ga

tA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA b+ha ra/ kam pa kam pa/ ma hA kam pa/ hU~M ma hA s+pha ra Na d+harma gra/ sA ga ra swA hA/

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni yon tan che ba ste mtha' yas par khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas

'byung ba thams cad ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas

ngan pa thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongs su thar bar byed pa ste shin tu dkon pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa/ nor bu'i

cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/ /rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon bar bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po

thabs brnyes pa/ /rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste/ /'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal/ /dar ba chen po mngon par rgyas/ /tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste/ /de bzhin yangs shing rdul dang bral/ /dbang chen rtse ltar 'od

ldan pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon/ /rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste/ /mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon/ /yon tan 'od brgyas bsgyings pa ste/ /nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thogs pa/ /srid gsum dag na spa

ba'i sku/ /rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can/ /lhun po zla 'byin ti se yi/ /rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po/ /dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa/ /rab tu dga' ba de bzhin des/ /yongs su dga' ldan chen po'i lha/ /

che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas gdung rgyud rgyas mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/ /ti se zla 'byin bzhin du

yangs/ /sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa/ /pad ma 'dab stong rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i pad ma legs par skyes/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod/ /sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'/ /snang bar byed pa 'byung ba po/ /

srid gsum ye shes nyi ma lags/ /gtso bo chen po cher grags pa/ /seng ge chen po stobs po che/ /cha lugs chen po zhal che ba/ /skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul/ /rdo rje byi ru bai dUr+ya/ /nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan
du thogs/ /byi ru gser gyi gcal bkram la/ /sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs/ /zhal mdangs nyi ma du ma'i gzi/ /lcang lo cod pan dbu thod can/ /rig sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la btud/ /rjed par

bya ba rnams kyis mchod/ /nor bu brgya 'gul 'od zer gyis/ /brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas/ /cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba/ /nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan/ /rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing / /dri med dkyil

'khor rab tu 'phro/ /rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi/ /'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can/ /'od zer mang pos phog pa yi/ /phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa/ /brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhad pa yi/ /'od kyis zhal gsal rnga yab

bskyod/ /dpung rgyan 'od zer spel mar bkod/ /tshon bris shin tu mdzes par 'tsher/ /lhun po phrad cing 'khrugs pa ltar/ /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs/ /rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/ /shin tu dga' mdzad bde sbyin

pa/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos/ /btsan pa kun las rnam par rgyal/ /snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste/ /mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar/ /byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can/ /kun nas spa ba'i dkyil

'khor ba/ /ma pham thub med dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che/ /byams pa'i snying po snying po che/ /byams pa'i pad ma las byung ba/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can/ /rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa/ /rig sngags

'chang ba rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin bsnyen cing bstod pa po/ /grub pa chen po rig sngags grub/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad/ /thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po/ /sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags/ /

gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges/ /mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa/ /nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi/ /snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad/ /'bar ba rtsa dmar 'od snang ba/ /dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste/ /

gzhung dang 'thun pa'i chos dbyings dang / /nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges/ /swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog /'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad/ /stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa/ /nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags/ /

stong byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan/ /mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can/ /dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa/ /sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rje ston/ /rlung chen

shugs kyis bskyod pa yi/ /g.yo dang 'brug sgrogs sgra ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul pad ma ste/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes/ /mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang
mnyam/ /de nas sa yi dbang phyug po/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la/ /bstod nas kun mkhyen gnod bral ba/ /thub pa nyi mas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /ming gi yon tan 'od

ldan pa/ /bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa/ /thabs chen bla na med pa ste/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde skyed pa/ /'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /

sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi/ /byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis/ /mi ni la la gang bstod pa/ /de la lha la sogs kun dang / /lag na rdo rje stobs chen rnams/ /rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal

kun/ /gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni/ /sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te/ /'di la the tshom yod med do/ /nang par mal nas langs nas ni/ /gang zhig byams

pa'i sems kyis bstod/ /de la byams pa rtogs pa yi/ /byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing / /sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal

sel ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs/ /'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// // 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad

pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor

thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM swa sti ka mA la k+Shi bi pu la sam b+ha ba/ d+harma d+harma go tsa ra swA hA/ gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa yang

g.yos par gyur/ rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grags par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyi 'khor gyi

dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA mchog gi gzungs 'byung bar shin du dka' ba/ bsod nams chen po/ sdig pa dang nyon mongs
pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin du
rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /pad ma lta bur 'gyur te/ 'khor gyi 'dam gyis mi gos so/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad snang bar byed do/ /zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams
cad rab tu sim par byed do/ /nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mtho dman med do/ /lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad

kyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /thar ba lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so/ /de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs ba tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang /

klog pa dang / rjod pa dang / ston pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char

mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan zan dang /

mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/ bde ba dang 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zha

bton te/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de/ snying nas phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags

pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam mkha'i snying po'i srid gsum sems can mchog /'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/ /sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog /thar pa'i sa bon 'khor
ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen/ /thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen/ /lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen/ /dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs
dang stobs min mkhyen/ /'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog /lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog /rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang 'dzin min mchog /dag mchog

rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog /zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab/ /'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab/ /rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/ /mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig

rab/ /legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron/ /thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron/ /dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron/ /rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron/ /mchog 'od yon

tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od/ /legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od/ /'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'char ba/ /rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang / /rin chen 'od kyi

dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po/ /rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang / /dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang / /rdo rje bzang po rdo 'od rdo rje 'bar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/ /

rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag /rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang / /na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo/ /sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams/ /mkha' sngo gzhal med

khang 'bar nang na bzhugs/ /lha zhal dri med shin du mi bzad 'bar/ /rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyu/ /sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrug byed phreng mchog can/ /glog gi stobs kyis snang bas bsgeg la brtan/ /ral gri
mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon/ /rdo yi yi mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs/ /'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul/ /gsal shing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa/ /
bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug /sku rnams thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad/ /mu tig phreng bas bsgegs shing mdzes par bgyis/ /sku mdzes
brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes/ /rab 'byam mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes/ /mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la/ /rig pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa/ /bde 'dren zhi ba

'dren cing 'od 'dren pa/ /cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren/ /byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye ba 'dren/ /legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can/ dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar/ /
rnam grags bsgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can/ /'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen/ /longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug /sku dmar sku mthon sku mdzes sku bzang ba/ /sku ser sku

dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/ /sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku/ /rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams/ /gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog /cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog /dpal 'dzin rin chen

dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog /sngags gzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs/ /rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu/ /srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'/ /ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa/ /yon tan

mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags/ /nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba/ /sems can rnam
dag yangs shing rnam par grags/ /srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog /zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os stag /skye dgu'i bdag po pad byung pad ma skyes/ /kun nas 'od bzang legs
bshad chos mnga' ba/ /dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag /blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang / /mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan/ /zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i

gnas/ /'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad/ /legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs skyed pa/ /snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad/ /rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo/ /blo

yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags/ /kun tu longs spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog / blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas pad ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal/ /dag cing spyan yangs cha

lugs yid du 'thad/ /snying po gsal ba'i snying po brten zhing dul/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba/ /spyan zur mda' ni rab tu gtad legs pa/ /'jigs med zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra/ /mdung thung
brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs/ /drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes/ /rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris par sla/ /rab tu drag pa gnyen rab gser mdog can/ /lha chen bde byed
gsal shing phyag na bsnams/ /spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel/ /'dod bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mda'/ /na bza' bzang banabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen/ /legs bris

sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mda'/ /na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal/ /zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra/ /zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad/ /bshad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs

mnga'/ /zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba/ /dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/ /sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan/ /blo gros chen po blo gros rno ba'i mchog /

rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang / /stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid/ /skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags/ /

mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu/ /sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can/ /mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan/ /ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs/ /gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad/ /

brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags/ /gcig pu skye dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes/ /dbang bskur brnyes shing sa bcur

legs par gnas/ /gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags/ /skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang / /sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas/ /bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa/ /

'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang / /nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi/ /mdun 'dug nang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang / /de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing / /dri ma'i gnas kun las

kyang thar bar 'gyur/ /g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin du mi bzad dang / /mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na/ /mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad bskyed nas/ /nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa/ /de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung
gnas thams cad dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol/ /des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang / /bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur/ /bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba

'am/ /rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang / /rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir/ /bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de phyir ji ste rtag tu 'dod bde kun/ /'dod na 'gro ba kun la
gcig dpa' ba/ /nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la/ /rtag tu brtan cing bsngags kyang bstan par bgyi/ /'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/

rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa kun du bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po kun du bzang po nam mkha'i dkyil kun du rab 'byam ma

lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor kun du 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang / rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa/ yon tan chen po'i skus kun du mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun

du bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po

snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun tu yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams

sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs nas/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shod cig /de nas byang chub sems

chen po'i mchog /lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas/ gzungs 'di bshad do/ /tad+ya thA/ oM na mo na mas+t+ri b+hu ba ne shwa re/ ma hA b+ho gA ya/ a sa ma sa

ma/ a mri ta sa ma/ a nan ta sa ma/ ga ga na sa ma/ tri b+hu ba na sa ma/ a she Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ pa ra ma ar+tha sa ma/ swa b+hA ba sa ma/ ta thA tA sa ma/ a ra dze sa ma/ shud d+hi sa ma/ bud d+hi sa ma/ d+harma ta thA tA sa ma/ a b+hi sha ma sa ma/

sa ma sa ma/ e ga nA ya/ sA ga ra bi shud d+ha/ A lo ka hi hi la ba d+ha ba d+ha la ba d+ha/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ oM pra sa ga ta/ na ya na ya/ ha~M nir a d+hiSh+Tha na/ sa~M b+ho ga /am a na la ya la ya/ d+harma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza ya/ hU~M hU~M/

d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas

te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas de skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun du gang bar byas so/ /de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas

gang gser gyi 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de/ dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste smras pa/ kye ma snying rje chen po dang

yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir

gnas pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs

chen mo/ bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par ma bsags shing / bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la/ thams cad

mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang mi nus na/ gzung ba'am/

bklag pa'am/ kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos/ gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o/ /kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed

pa legs par rnyed pa'o/ /'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang po'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o/ /yon tan
thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur
ro/ /lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar

'gyur ro/ /'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /shing gcig 'greng gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'gro bzhin du bzlas
brjod byas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na bsam gtan chen po 'thob par 'gyur la nyon mongs pa yang bral bar

'gyur ro/ /'phags pa kun du bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug la me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pas mchod nas lus ngal bar 'gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/ ngal bar gyur

nas de nyid du nyal na rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ chos kyi snang ba chen po yang gsol bar mdzad

do/ /'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod tshe rjes nas sa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes kyang gsungs so/ /de nas

lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro/ /mthu che ba dang / dbang che bar grags par yang 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang de la
blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / /nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la yang phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par
bya'o/ /de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur

ro/ /lha la sogs pa yang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang

po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje gtsug phud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs

pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen po rnams dang / rin chen dra ba can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang / lha mo

sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / dar chen dang / gzugs bzang dang / shin tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / gzhon nu ma rnams dang /

bran rnams dang / bram mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang / lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po
la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog

'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog /sna tshogs kun gyi 'byor pa che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje mchog /sna tshogs

gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag /rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che/ /gzi brjid chen po stobs po che/ /gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab/ /khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal/ /rdo rje chen po rab tu bzhad/ /bsgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa/ /rol

mo chen pos rnam par rol/ /rab dga' chen po 'dul ba po/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/ /btsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag /sa steng sa 'og sa la dgyes/ /de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa/ /dul dang sbyin pa'i go rims

thabs/ /rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags/ /shes nyen can te bzod la dgyes/ /brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che/ /brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa/ /stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste/ /mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang / /

yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba/ /rdul sel rgyal po chen po ste/ /rgyal po dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba/ /rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs/ /cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba/ /mkhas pa mdzes pa skal pa bzang / /shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa/ /snying po chen

po las byung dpal/ /nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/ /sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam/ /rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can/ /gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra/ /rmugs dang smyo

ba zhi bar mdzad/ /thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil/ /g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes pa ste/ /g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa/ /gsung bzang ngang pa'i gdangs su bzhad/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras/ /

dbang po las lhag thub dang mnyam/ /chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan/ /rab dga'i bu lon zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skems par mdzad/ /dpa' bo rgyags pa'i rims nad sel/ /khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par

'joms/ /gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang ldan/ /mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang / /mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das/ /sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig /byang chub snying por rgya cher rol/ /rim pa rab ston dge ba ste/ /

spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge/ gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa/ /dag mdzad bsreg sbyin mchog sbyin po/ /'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms/ /'thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po/ /rdo rje'i 'jig rten
gcig snang ba/ /skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag /nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa/ /sems can 'khor ba zhi mdzad pa/ /brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral/ /kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba po/ /
kun tu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/ /kun tu nyes pa sel ba lags/ /mi bzad sa 'og rnam par dkrugs/ /de bzhin zad mdzad thug par mdzad/ /

nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs/ /nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad/ /'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phro mdzad pa/ /rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po stobs skyed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms/ /

pha rol bzhugs pa sdig sel ba/ /dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can/ /dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin/ /'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa/ /ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin/ /longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa/ /dbang phyug sbyin

zhing tshig sbyin la/ /nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can/ /gzugs sbyin dpa' bo rnam par rgyal/ /dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa/ /bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po/ /dkyil 'khor mgu bar

sgrub mdzad pa/ /'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad/ /rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam/ /sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba can/ /yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan/ /brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can/ /gsung ba chen po

shes rab che/ /sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa/ /mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi/ /theg pa bla na med par ldan/ /mchod pa chen po'i chos shes pa/ /'bras bu chen po chos kyi mchog /ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa

po/ /zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa/ /bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /kun tu rab 'byam sel mdzad pa/ /snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen/ /snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /snying rje chen po yongs su

rdzogs/ /dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad/ /mtsho mchog dang ba rab mtho ba/ /rtsod chen 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /skye dgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i 'byor ba can/ /kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba/ /dga'

ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po/ /kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste/ /zhe sa bzang po rtag tu mnga'/ /dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad ma lags/ /zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs/ /mkhas pa rgyags spangs

cho ga mkhyen/ /spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/ /slob dpon chen po grags pa che/ /dam pa nyid de bla na med/ /gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad/ /

de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni/ /yon tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas/ /dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs/ /yon tan 'byung la rig sngags rgyal/ /gtsug na nor bu thogs la sogs/ /mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang / /sdug bsngal

chu bo bcom pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs/ /kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin/ /mi rnams la la gang zhig gis/ /sdig bsal kun tu bzang po la/ /snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na/ /

des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don/ /mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing / /de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi/ /ye shes ma lus smra bar nus/ /de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya yi spo las nges par

byung gyur cing / /yon tan sna tshogs 'byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams la/ /bstod pa chen pos snang byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba
thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan

brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM badzra tsaN Da
sarba duSh+Ta na ta ka /ha na/ da ha/ pa tsa hU~M phaT/ de nas gzungs sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad

byung ngo / /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to/ /lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du

rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ sdang ba sel ba 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig /rdo rje 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba lags so/ /rig sngags

thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang / dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang /

brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs bskyed pa dang / gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa skyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa

dang / dbang bgyid pa dang / sdang ba 'joms pa dang / sdang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dang bar bgyid

pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs pa bgyis pa sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / mtshams

ma mchis pa zlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal skyed pa dang / skal ba bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang /
gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa

lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa chen po dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa 'jig pa dang / sdang ba dang / byad stem dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang / srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs

pa chen po byung ba na/ nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing lan bdun brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams

cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so/ /de nas

'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje snying po stobs po che/ /

rdo rje 'khrugs pa zhags pa che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje hU~M gi hU~M lags te/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po/ /chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che/ /chags pa'i zhags pa 'gyogs pa che/ /phyag dmar phyag ni

ring ba ste/ /spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags/ /rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che/ /mthon ting dbu skras brgyan pa lags/ /ral gri sngon po ral gri che/ /dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngo ba/ /

'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan/ /rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs/ /rdo rje spro ba'i stobs po che/ /khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che/ /sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel/ /khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu bstod/ /khro bo bgegs rigs sel
bar mdzad/ /gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa ste/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni nges par 'gums/ /dbyig thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che/ /'jigs

pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu khro/ /sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris/ /gzi brjid skyed pa grags mdzad pa/ /bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod/ /sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa/ /drag po chen po rdo rje khro/ /sgyel byed drag po

sgyel bar mdzad/ /gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/ /rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'/ /rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan/ /pad ma ti se lhun po'i rtse/ /gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po/ /spyod yul bskal pa

grangs med gsum/ /rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can/ /rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags/ /na bza' lcang lo rtsa dmar gsol/ /mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes/ /srin po srung ba drag po ste/ /me tog

phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes/ /nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od/ /'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed/ /grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po/ /rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba/ /mgur

bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags/ /cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od/ /phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa/ /ye shes che ldan srung ba che/ /rlung dmar langs te spyod yul ring / /gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs/ /
'jigs las grol ba rab 'jigs pa/ /rgyal chen gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon/ /'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig /gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug pud gsum/ /
'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan/ /za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad/ /mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa/ /tsham tshom med de srid las byung / /rtag pa skar dgyes dus 'byor pa/ /rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel
bar mdzad/ /rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste/ /bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags/ /bai dUr+ya ltar dri med sku/ /mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs/ /dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad/ /

dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog /lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste/ /brten po dpa' bo lham me ba/ /bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod/ /dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /mtshon cha che tshogs cod pan can/ /rig

sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dga' ba/ /pad ma chen po'i phyag ring ba/ /pad ma las byung pad ma'i mchog /nag po chen po 'byung po che/ /gtum chen thog thog chen po ste/ /rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje'i mtshon

cha brgya rdzogs pa/ /rtul phod thub dka' brtson pa ste/ /'byung po chen po'i tshogs kyi rje/ /zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon/ /brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems/ /rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba/ /rdo rje yis ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /

rdo rje'i lcags mdas sreg mdzad pa/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni rnam par sbyong / /rdo rje don yod rdo rje dbang / /rdo rje bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal/ /ye shes dag pa theg pa che/ /thabs brnyes snying rje chen po lags/ /rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/ /

spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po/ /rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan/ /mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen/ /rdo rje chen po mgon po pa/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sgrogs/ /me tog chun po 'od gsal

ba/ /dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras/ /des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags/ /sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog /rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje'i gtsug sdug shes rab can/ /rdo rje'i bkod pa rab tu mdzes/ /

mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag /bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags/ /dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang / /rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed/ /gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung / /skyes pa bud med tshogs dga'

ba/ /rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrogs/ /rdo rje'i sgrog ste rnam par 'joms/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /nor bus spras pa'i na bza' gsol/ /spos dang me tog phreng gis

brgyan/ /dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/ /rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dbang phyug chen po grags pa che/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /sangs rgyas dkyil

'khor ston pa po/ /dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa/ rdo rje gsang bas

brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje mtshan rtsa brgyad pa 'di/ /ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung / /sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa/ /ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di/ /dad pa gang zhig 'chang byed pa/ /grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /nges pa kun

las rnam par grol/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/ /de ni sdig pa kun las grol/ /ngan 'gro kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /

gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di/ /su zhig nang par langs nas 'don/ /rgyal po chen po grong khyer ba/ /gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa/ /'jig rten thams cad de dbang
'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang / /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa yis/ /bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje'i drung du

brjod/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang / /ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang / /zil gyis gnon par

mi nus so/ /shes rab can ni gang zhig gis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/ /gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang / /bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /nges par gnas shing
gtsang mar 'don/ /mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// // 'phags pa 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba rnam par dag pa'i

blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku zhabs rten gyi pad ma la lha dang mi dang /

lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par

'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho ma hA ma Ni ru tsi ra ka lA pa bi tra/ mug ta dA ma/ a la~M kri ta sha ri ra/ pa ra satwa mo tsa ka /ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma ko Sha d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma lab ha/ bi dza ya su ra ta/ sam b+ho

ga u pa da sha ka /kle sha ga ra pra sha ma ka /shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba/ a nu swa ri/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra/ ba ra ha/ ba ra na da da/ oM ma hA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ a nan ta sa ma/ a man ta b+ha dra/ sa man

ta san d+ha ra/ sa man ta a ka ra/ sa man ta pra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ he he/ many+dzu ra ba/ ma hA badzra khaDa kha/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ bi ra dza bi ra dza/ karma a ba ga ma ka /ku ru ku ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru

mu ru/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ ma hA ma hA ma hA ma hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ho b+ho/ b+hi ma b+hi ma/ na da na da/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+he satwa/ mo tsa ya/ ma ma nA tha/ ma nu sri ta/ a ba ya duH

kha na/ su ka da/ ma hA ka ra Ni kA/ a nA thA han/ duHkhi to han/ sa ra dzo han/ ud pad dru to han/ a bi big to han/ ku si d+ho han/ mA ra na d+harmo han/ twan b+ha ga bAn/ duHkhi ta nA~M/ su kan da da/ a nA tha nA~M/ sa nA thA ka ra/

sa ra dza sam/ bi ra dza ska ra/ u pad dru tA mA~M/ swa ra u pa dra ba pra sha ma ka /a bi bi ga ta nA~M/ ku sha la sa~M b+ha ra/ pa ri pU ra yi tA/ ku si da nA~M/ ma hA bir+ya d+ha tA/ mA ra na d+harmi Na/ ma mi ta pa dA dA tA/ ma ma bi b+ha ga bAn/ nA tho b+ha ba/ sha ra nA~M/

pa ra ya nA~M/ tra tA/ sarba duHkhA ni me pra sha ma ya/ sarba kle sha ra dzA~M si mi/ a ba na ya/ sarba san sa ra u pa dra ba/ duHkha ni me nA sha ya/ sarba ku sha la d+harma pa ri pU ra me ku ru/ sarba karma a ba ra Na/ kle sha pa ra ba ta me bi ka ri/ ma hA

bo d+hi satwa si bi d+hi/ bir+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo ga~M me san ni yo dza ya/ a ra Na d+harma/ bi ra ka bi ra dza/ san dza ha/ pra dza ha/ d+har Ni sa ma/ kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+ha sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/ rig sngags don kun sgrub pa

'di/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ /de ma thag tu sems can rnams/ /skye dang rga ba zad par 'gyur/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/ /log

'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur/ /sdig pa zhi bar byed pa yi/ /gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang / /grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed/ /'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/ /

'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrags shing / /gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na/ /brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/ /sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis/ /sa yi steng yang

khyab par gyur/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /srin po mi bzang gzugs can rnams/ /stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /skad phyung tshig ni 'thun par smras/ /lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ /

thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/ /gang na rdo rje ral gri che/ /de yi drung lhags smras pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la/ /shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can/ /bgegs
kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/ /sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang / /sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag /shin du stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/ /drag po drag po rab 'joms pa/ /gzi brjid gzi

brjid mnga' ba'i dpal/ /dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe/ /rdo rje can te snying sbyong ba/ /mi shes pa yi rab rib sel/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba/ /skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes/ /gzhu stobs can la

phyag ring ba/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad/ /mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can/ /spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/ /dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol/ /'jam pa'i

dbyangs de rab tu bzhad/ /dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /ha ha'i sgra ni grags par bsgrags/ /rab tu dang bas bstan pa dga'/ /rgya chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can/ /tshul

mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste/ /sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /cha lugs sngo la sa skyong ba/ /lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad/ /'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel bstan/ /rgyal po'i 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa/ /
brtan po rnams la brtan par grags/ /yon tan dag gis phyogs su bzhad/ /btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa/ /rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags/ /stobs po che la shugs che ba/ /phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba

po/ /sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste/ /'dzem shes rab srung ngo tsha shes/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i mchog /dkyil 'khor chen po ston pa po/ /dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags/ /dkyil 'khor

'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan/ /ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba/ /mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam/ /hU~M gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po/ /

lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyid/ /zham ring gad rgyangs chen po can/ /rlung drag mun pa sel mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags/ /gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba/ /drag

po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can/ /'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu ston/ /spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa/ /nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba/ /nyi ma'i 'od 'dra

'ja' bkug bzhin/ /tha ler zhugs shing rgya cher bzhad/ /mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad/ /nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin/ /gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa/ /
dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri/ /kun du rmongs pa sel bar mdzad/ /'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa/ /zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa/ /dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can/ /nor bu'i rgyan gyis

brgyan pa ste/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron/ /rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po/ /ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa/ /dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog /'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste/ /'jigs pa med pa'i gnas

sbyin pa/ /dkar ba sngo ba 'od bzang ba/ /mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags/ /ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston/ /shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad/ /stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa/ /byams pa

mchog dang tha ma mkhyen/ /rnam par grags pa gsan pa des/ /rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los sgyur/ /'jigs med blo gros shes rab can/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa chos 'dzin pa/ /mgur bzang 'dul mdzad zhi ba ste/ /zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa/ /lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/ /sems can kun la rab ston pa/ /brtan po sems can

kun gyi mchog /sems can rnams kyi blo la mkhas/ /sred med bu ste drag shul stobs/ /me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste/ /byis pa sku mchog mchog sbyin pa/ /rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/ /phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad/ /
bdag gir mi 'dzin rdul med brtan/ /mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa/ /bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/ /mi mchog btsan pa bskyod du med/ /de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/ /brtan po sangs rgyas
de bzhin gshegs/ /mya ngan med cing gnas pa med/ /'joms med tshig bzang chu lugs bzang / /dpa' bo dgra rnams rab 'joms pa/ /tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod
pa gnod pa khyab par gshegs/ /mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog /gshin rje pham mdzad skye dgu srung / /las dang nyon mongs rab sreg pa/ /ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags/ /
legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing / /dad pa bskyed par byed pa 'di/ /lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/ /bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang / /
gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang / /mdangs 'phrog gtum po rgod rnams kyis/ /de ring legs par bstod par gyur/ /'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gis rab/ /bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar
gyur/ /de dag kun la bltas nas kyang / /'di skad du ni tshig smras pa/ /khyed kun rtag tu bgegs med cing / /nges legs thar pa thob gyur la/ /'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog /
nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig /de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing / /'brug chen sgra ni sgrogs pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/ /shar phyogs gzigs
nas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul/ /sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs/ /shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur/ /
kye ma bsod nams cher byas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni rab sbyang phyir/ /dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/ /'jam pa'i klog gis rab tu bshad/ /la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag
nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi/ /grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am/ /yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung / /de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal kun las thar bar
'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/ /de yis nges par thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang / /ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa/ /
rab dga' shin du dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /sa chen dam pa de dag kyang / /
gang zhig nges gnas 'deng pa yi/ /sems can chen pos mi thogs par/ /tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang / /sems can kun la sdug pa dang / /
spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/ /byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang / /sdig pa thams cad zhi byed pa/ /bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi/ /ming brgya
rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /nang par langs nas su brjod pa/ /de la rig sngags
'chang kun dang / /de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag /rtag tu yang ni bsrung bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang / /
de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams/ /de la nges par srung bar byed/ /de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing / /mnyam par bzhag par snang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /bgegs
dang log 'dren chen po dag /dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis/ /rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas/ /'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so/ /lan
cig bklags na tshangs chen dang / /bsod nams mnyam pa thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/ /nyin re mtshan mchog brjod byas na/ /dri ma med cing rab dag la/ /rab tu
'od gsal sgra snyan dang / /sems can thams cad dga' ba yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob/ /mtshungs pa med cing stobs bskyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang / /'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha
rnams kyis bstod cing / /yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi/ /gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// // 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mri ta bin du dza ba ma hA su kha swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
snang mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyi
gzungs sngags 'di phyung bas sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzungs sngags 'di thos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i

bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la'i rna lam du grag par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes
brgyad dam/ tshes bcwa lnga la smyung bar 'dug cing gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas
mchod la bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjod byas na/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /byang
chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / nyon
mongs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen po sa gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs gcig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te/
byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon bar bstod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
che ba/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/ /chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing / /nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/ /skyon
bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing / /theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/ /theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /snang
ba chen po snang ba brnyes/ /yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag /zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /theg pa chen po dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas theg
pa rtogs gyur cing / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnam grags pa/ /rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/ /dar ba chen po nyon mongs choms/ /bgegs
thub gshin rje thub pa ste/ /rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zla ba chen po nyi ma che/ /lhun po chen po dbang phyug che/ /lha chen mgon po chen po ste/ /'byor pa chen po khyod phyag
'tshal/ /sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing / /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che/ /rnam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
spyod yul zhugs pa ste/ /chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags/ /ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che/ /sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mdzes yon tan snying po mkhyen/ /
rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che/ /ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bstan pa gnas pa dbang bdag po/ /bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/ /
yangs pa dri med shes rab can/ /snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon/ /zhi la 'jig rten dag par mdzad/ /ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na/ /dpa'
btsan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/ /'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste/ /zhi ba zhi mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /
thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che/ /bde 'gror gnas pa dri ma med/ /rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen/ /nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtse mo yangs par rnam par grags/ /
sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa/ /snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog /dkon mchog gsum
dang spyod yul 'dra/ /rnam gsum mkhyen pa rnyed pa'i bdag /rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi/ /'byor pa brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes/ /
bskal pa dag ni grangs med par/ /tshogs chen bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes/ /sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/ /ye shes sa

khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa/ /nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel/ /ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba/ /mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mgon po chen po snang ba che/ /
sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel/ /zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa/ /yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa/ /chos kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs/ /dkon mchog
gsum rigs dpe med pa/ /rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje chen po dri med mchog /rdo rje'i mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'/ /nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan/ /ye
shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'/ /de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa/ /sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong / /shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras/ /sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje'i 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal/ /rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen chen po rin chen blo/ /rin chen rdo rje 'od
che ba/ /rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung / /rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes pa/ /ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston/ /stong nyid longs spyod yul
dang ldan/ /stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can/ /dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral/ /chos gcig las byung snang ba po/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i
tshul chen lags/ /'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa/ /'jig rten chos las rnam par 'das/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/ /brgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor
dag /nyes pa ma lus bsal ba ste/ /phyal chen skye bo kun la phan/ /sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po/ /kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' mkhyen dga' la longs
spyod pa/ /dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog /dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can/ /dga' la snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgeg chen 'jam zhing dgongs par ldan/ /rnam
bar bsgegs la spyod pa brtan/ /rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog /sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /rdo rje mchog gis dkyil 'khor che/ /theg
pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis ni/ /
ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /rdo rje'i bstan pa rnam grags pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor pa/ /gang zhig
ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /'di dag so sor rjod byed na/ /nga ni nyes pa kun zlog cing / /rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang / /nang bar langs nas gtsang ma yis/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/ /
blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa/ /de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /nang par langs nas rjod byed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams kyis

kyang yongs su gtang / /sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang / /de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang / /ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing / /sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/ /ming

brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa/ /des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba/ /gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa la/ /
ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// // 'phags pa

sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sum b+ha ni/ sum b+ha/ ha ra
tsa ra/ ma hA pA sha ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha badzra sa twa swA hA/ de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi/ /gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur/ /
sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras/ /skal ldan chen po legs so legs/ /sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas/ /khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing / /
yon tan dpag med mchog bskyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang / /nyes pa zlog byed thos pa ni/ /'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na/ /nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te/ /ji ltar
'dam gyi pad ma dag /'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin/ /lus can dag las su yang rung / /khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa/ /de dag las ni gcig tsam yang / /byang chub
las ni ldog mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog /thos nas mos par byed pa ni/ /nges par yon tan thams cad kyang / /thob par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /de
nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor/ /langs te sa yi dbang phyug po/ /sa yi snying po sa mchog la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni/ /sa yi snying po gtso bo che/ /glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan
mnga' ba/ /cod pan can te sa brnyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor ba mchog /rig ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas/ /gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po/ /gzhi bcas ldan pa'i rlung gi tshul/ /

swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog /snying po snying po mkhyen par grags/ /gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol/ /sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs can/ /sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan
ldan/ /'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po/ /rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen/ /snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med/ /mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba/ /shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs/ /'dod

chags la sogs skyon bsal cing / /gar thabs chen po ston pa po/ /ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra/ /nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa/ /nyi ma chen po nyid yin te/ /dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas bskor/ /yon

tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho/ /yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi

mchog /thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste/ /theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med/ /mchod pa chen po sgra che ba/ /zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /rdo rje 'chang chen mtshan brgya pa/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor me

tog thod/ /blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/ /pad ma chen po stobs po che/ /gsang sngags chen po tshogs chen po/ /sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags/ /lag na rdo rje yon tan des/ /nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan/ /

mnyam nyid 'byam longs spyod pa yi/ /rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can/ /rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan/ /sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin/ /sa la longs spyod longs spyod bzang / /mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs/ /rab 'byam

snod ni rnam par grags/ /smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa/ /spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste/ /me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings/ /spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/ /brtan po brtan la bde sbyin pa/ /ded dpon dpal bzang
chen po ste/ /gangs can lhun po lta bu lags/ /dbang po gshin rje'i rgyal chen dang / /btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug /'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs/ /de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul
can/ /rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa/ /dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /gzigs pa ring ba spyan yangs pa/ /nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med/ /thogs pa mi dpogs
rin chen gtsug /srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu/ /dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal/ /dag pa gtsang ba gso sbyong can/ /rnam par gnon pa'i g.yul las 'das/ /ljang mdog skyabs
mdzad snying rje che/ /stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba/ /bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can/ /dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed/ /sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa/ /
mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan/ /dga' ba rgya chen rab 'byung ba/ /rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen/ /rigs kun tu ni mchod pa lags/ /rgyal
po rigs mchog skyes pa'i rten/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan/ /rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /mngon bar 'phags
pa khyab pa mchog /mgrin bzangs nad dang bral ba lags/ /skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /grol ba smin mdzad 'dud
par mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis brgyan/ /rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas/ /rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten/ /grub pa sbyin pa rnam dag mchog /tshul dang tshul min rtogs
