pa po/ /dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste/ /'od zer ljang khu'i 'od dang ldan/ /ser la na bza' ser po banabs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyi brgyan/ /spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal/ /nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba/ /

rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma med/ /sku yang dag cing na bza' dag /dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan/ /dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste/ /'byung ldan srid pa sel mdzad pa/ /'khor ba zad

mdzad shes rab can/ /tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che/ /'byung ldan rab 'byam shes rab can/ /ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba/ /sa yi snying po snying po che/ /

rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren/ /dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas/ /zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil/ /dga' dad dang ba skyed pa ste/ /

ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba/ /rlung gi drag shul lta bur drag /drag po lags te drag sel gtsang / /rgyal bar byed cing rgyal ba zhi/ /rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad/ /lhun po ti se ma la yas/ /spyod yul zab mo non

pa ste/ /rin chen rdo rje snying po che/ /sa gzhi'i spyod yul mnga' ba lags/ /rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs la lhur dgyes pa/ /shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags/ /

rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste/ /phyogs bcu'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpas bstod nas ni/ /rdo rje sa gsum dbang mchog smras/ /

yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing / /nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan/ /sa yi steng na ngas ma mthong / /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste/ /sdig pa thams cad

sel ba dang / /dri ma kun bral yon tan nges/ /de phyir bsgrim pa thams cad kyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di/ /rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /

bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi/ /gnas mchog bla na med pa ste/ /dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yin/ /yid ni shin du dang ba yis/ /sa yi snying po'i mtshan gsal ba/ /'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/ /yon tan

mchog ni gang brjod dang / /dpal yon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /mi ni gang zhig rjod byed pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las myur du 'grol/ /'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs

sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so/ /sangs rgyas 'khor brgyad dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// //skar zhus// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN Da la ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU

tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

ri gru 'dzin na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin

chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom

'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na des ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin du phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste

legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig /oM ma hA hU~M ma hA bI ra swA hA/

snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do/ /oM hrI hU~M pad ma pri ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/ /oM me hA rA Na swA hA/ byams pa'i snying po'o/ /oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ya swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i

snying po'o/ /oM swA hri rA dza ya swA hA/ kun du bzang po'i snying po'o/ /oM ku ru b+ha na ra ha swA hA/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /oM shrI a~M ra~M ga swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o/ /oM ni swA ra~M b+ha swA hA/ sgrib pa thams cad

rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o/ /oM k+Shi ti ha rA dza swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dkyil 'khor

gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na de'i don thams cad grub par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs

so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ skar// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba

ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na hri da ya gu h+ya d+hA tu ka raN Da nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba'i ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i
gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na dri ma med pa'i kun dga'

ra ba na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang / yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas 'khor gyi nang de na bram ze chen po shing

sa la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/ 'dzangs pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ mthong na dga' ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang gcig tu dkon mchog

gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ zhib mo brtags pa/ sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ phyug pa/ rdzas mang ba/ yo byad phun
sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug
pas mngon bar mchod do/ /na bza' rin 'bum ri ba yang gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sras tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis

gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang

bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas de rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / zhal zas dang / yo byad dang / zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams

nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med khang chen po dang / gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / bdug pa khyer te/ 'khor mang po dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags te/

bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus kyi tshod la bab na bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal

pa/ 'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad deng don chen po mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur sheg /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba

des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par shes so/ /de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis mchod pa dang /

bkur sti chen pos mchod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so/ /'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya

byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang

zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod do/ /skyed mos tshal de'i nang na mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa tsher mas gang ba/ rtswa dang / shing dang / gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod do/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo / /phyag dar gyo mo'i phung po de las kyang legs so

zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so/ /deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ltas bzang po'o/ /bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa ni yang khyod legs so/ /

deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas lan gsum bskor ba mdzad nas nyid kyi sku las na

bza' bsil nas mchod rten rnying ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa bstan te/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des

phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang spyan mchi mas gang zhing bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis

kyang 'od zer bkye ste/ mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po chen po der zhugs so/ /de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag ya mtshan chen por gyur cing yi chad de 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar/

snying ni 'gul/ rdo rje ni gsor zhing / rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das bshums pa'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba gang gis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi mas gang ba bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i nang du

zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin

gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi

gang bu snyed gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas khar yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang

bu ji snyed pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang / spyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so/ /lag na rdo rje gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to/ /lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs

'di ni phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo/ /kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /

kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i

sa la gnas so/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o/ /

kha cig gis ni sa drug pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su

rdzogs so/ /bram ze chen po de yang mngon bar shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang / ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong

nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyi yon tan gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na/ bcom ldan

'das gang gi slad du/ phu dud dang / bkur sti dang / shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur blta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/ lag na rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs

pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /

gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcangs par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa

'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur zhing / nyin gcig bzhin gzigs

par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/

rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang /

me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po

tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang / sems can gyi

tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang / gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di ni cho 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po

ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i

mchod rten du gda' bar bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi/ 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin no/ /lag na rdo rje 'on

kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par 'gyur gyi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa'am/ 'gyes par mi 'gyur

te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa snang ba las kyang nub par gyur to/ /lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa

kun tu spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang skyed par mi byed de/ rgyu de

dang rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo/ /lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo / /dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par 'gyur gyis/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod

rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du

'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang / spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig

sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo'i phreng

ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka dra bar sbrel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis dang char khab kyi gzugs dang dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyi brlabs dang / bden pa dang / dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phu dud dang / sti stang byed

pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug pa la

sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang na mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs

de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog chags mi srun pa'am/

gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gcan zan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi srun pa dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / byi ba dang / sre mo dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / bye ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang /

mchu rings dang / rta bla ba'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang /

srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / rjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams

cad dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing mchod rten mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der ba lang

gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang

dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin zhing / me dang chus kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam

yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung bar 'gyur ro/ sa phyogs der srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong bar

byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / mjug rings chen

po yang nyin mtshan 'thun par byed par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing / legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang

mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo / /yul na gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan

de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo / /bstod par byed/ bskor ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan

de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs so/ /mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan

ji lta ji lta du las byed pa'i sa 'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi'am/ dngul gyi'am/ gser gyi'am/ zangs kyi byed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te/ de'i nang du bzhag na bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun

gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /'phang dang / them skas dang / kha ran dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba thams cad

kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs

pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang / mchod gnas su 'gyur ro/ /sku gzugs dang mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur

ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin

gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

lag na rdo rje nyon cig /de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum

dag ste/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ /na ma s+t+rai yad d+hi ka nA~M/ sarba ta

thA ga tA nA~M/ oM b+hu bi bA ban ba ra ba tsa Te/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+ha re d+ha re/ sarba ta thA ga tA d+hA tu d+ha re/ pad mA ma b+hi ti/ dza ya bA re/ u tsu la sma ra ta thA ga tA/ d+harmA tsakra pra bar te na badzra bod+hi maN Da a la~M ka ra/ a la~M kri ti/ sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hi Sh+Thi te/

bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ bud d+ha ya bud d+ha ya/ sa~M bo d+ha ni sa~M bo d+ha ya/ tsa la tsa la tsa la~M tu/ sarba a ba ra Na ni/ sarba pA pa~M bi ga te/ hu ru hu ru/ sarba sho kA bi ka ti/ sarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya badzri Ni/ sa~M b+ha ba sa~M b+ha ba/ ta thA ga tA

gu he d+ha ra Ni mu drai/ bud d+he su bud d+he/ sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hi te d+hA tu gar b+he swA hA/ sa ma ya a d+hi te swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya d+hA tu mu drai swA hA/ su pra ti ta stu be ta thA ga tA a d+hi te hU~M hU~M swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA uSh+NI Sha d+hA tu

mu drA Ni/ sarba ta thA ga tA na sa d+hA tu bi b+hu shi ta a d+hi te hu ru hu ru/ hU~M hU~M swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin

gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta

bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang byin gyi brlabs pa yin no/ /gang na

ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang zhing

bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun

gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing / 'phang dang / legs par rnam par 'byes pa dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das

kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar

gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de rtsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus/ skar zhus// @#/ /bod skad du/ shes pas thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ skad shes thams mthar grub mchod zhes ba'i dkon

mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul dang / 'dul ba dang /

rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la/ phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge la/ /mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od dpag med/ /spyan ras gzigs la bdag phyag

'tshal/ /rigs gsum la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri rab chen po sna lnga las grub pa/ gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na/ rin po che sna

tshogs pa'i khang pa dang / tshad med pa'i mchod rten bzhi dang / rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po'i gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse mo'i dbyibs kyang mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na/ lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras

gzigs dang / byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tor dang / thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa rnams nas 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu snyed cig bkye ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod kyis mi lang ba thams cad 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad long ba

rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang / 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang / dig pa rnams smra shes pa dang / theng po rnams dang / zha bo rnams 'gro zhing yan lag rangs pa dang / nad pa rnams nad dang bral ba dang / dmyal ba rnams

tshe phri nas rims kyis sdug bsngal las thar ba dang / gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyi mchod rten chos kyi skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te/ 'od

zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur to/ /de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang /

'phan dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab dang / dril bu dang / dar spyang dang / spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / bshos dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ bris sam/ klog gam/ ming nyan par

byed na/ de mtshams med pa lnga dang mi dge ba bcu dang / sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o/ /oM s+t+rai yad d+he

sarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ sa~M ha ra na a yu sa~M sho d+hA ya/ pa pa~M sarba ta thA ga tA sa man ta uSh+NI Sha bi man to bi shud d+he swA hA/ rig pa chen mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad

mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i

'os su 'gyur ba dang / rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam/ mgul du thogs na/ de lha dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid ri brag gam/ tshal lam/ dgon pa'am/

sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /trai yad d+he sarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya gar b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar b+he/ sa~M ha ra Na a yu sa~M sho d+ha ya/ pA pa~M sarba

ta thA ga tA sa man ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma la bi shu/ ma hA be ra dze ra ga~M bi ra si/ d+harma d+hA tu gar b+he/ bi bi sa ra a a la~M swA hA zhes brjod na/ sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid chu'am/ chu bo'am/ mtsho'am/

rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang las rgal ba na yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /trai yad d+he sarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya gar b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar b+he/ sa~M ha ra na

a yu sa~M sho d+ha ya/ pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga tA sa man tA/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud d+ha/ ma hA be ra tse ra ga~M bi ra si d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sa ra a ma ma ki swA hA zhes brjod na/ chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /

gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di btab na/ nam mkha' thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin tu 'gyur ro/ /oM s+t+rai yad d+he sarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya gar b+te/

dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar b+he/ sa~M ha ra Na A yu sa~M sho d+ha ya/ pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga tA sa man to/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud d+he/ ma hA be ra tse ra ga~M bi ra si d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sa ra a a e kha~M ya swA hA zhes brjod na/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad

mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba dang / bskor ba bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bzlas te/ 'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod rten btab na nyon mongs pa

dang / sgrib pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sa dang / shing dang / rdo dang / 'jim pa dang / 'bi 'bi gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis btab ste/ mchod rten btab na rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi

rgyur 'gyur te/ oM rad na tse te pan tsa ye bi bi sa ra swA hA zhes brjod nas ba'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs na thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na/ gang zhig gser

dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengs su gsol yang rdo dang / shing dang / kham pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags

byin gyi brlabs ma bzhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te btab na/ 'byung ba chen po gang la mchod rten btab kyang bskal pa dpag tu med pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas/ khyim

bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo dang / shing leb la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar bram

ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de/ bcu gcig kun du 'od kyi sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya la sogs

pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na mchod rten gcig btab na yang

bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis ma btab na bye ba btab kyang gcig dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gong ma bzhin no/ /rig pa chen mo de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ sUk+Sh+me/ sUk+Sh+me/

sa me sa ma ye/ shan te dAn te/ nir gu le/ ya sho te tso/ sarba bud d+ha/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hi te/ a nu mi de swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ 'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mchod

rten gcig btab na bya ba btab par 'gyur ro/ /brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /stong btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni

byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /'bum btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni phyogs
bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga man chad gdab pa'i mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni thog mar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam/
mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas der sa bdag gis byin gyis brlab cing sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa mchod rten dang /

dge ba la bar chad byed pa rnams mtshams gcad par bya ste/ thig skud la rig pa chen po'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/ oM badzra su tra hU~M phaT ces brjod nas thig skud de nyid rdo rje'i skud par dmigs nas mchod rten gyi sa khyon

ji tsam ran pa dang 'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam ran pa thig gis sa bcad/ de bzhin du sa bcad na sa gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa de nyid la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor

brgyad pa la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+Ta na hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo rje phur bur dmigs te dbus dang grwa bzhir gdab bo/ /de bzhin du btab na mi dang mi ma

yin pa las bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /seng ldeng gi phur bu ni mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blangs kyi bar du mi dbyung bar gzhag go/ /de nas til dang yungs

kar la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM a mri te ha na ha na hU~M phaT ces lan bdun bzlas te/ sa'i phyogs su gtor bas sa'i phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu
med par 'gyur/ de ltar sa gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su byin gyis brlab te/ bgegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa las mtshams bcad de/ spos dang / me tog dang / gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis

kyang sa phyogs de na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsngos te/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklags na/ sa phyogs de yang shin du bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa brko ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko bar bya'o/ /oM badzra kha na kha na hU~M phaT/ ces bzlas shing sa gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te brkos na/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas gtsang ma gcig tu bzhag nas sa brdung ba'i cho ga ni tho ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te/ rig pa chen mo'i

sngags 'dis btab ste brdung ngo / /badzra mung ka ra a ko Ta ya a ko Ta ya hU~M phaT ces lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par 'gyur

ro/ /de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba ni spos chab la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyas gtugs te/ spos chu de'i nang du yang chos nyid kyi yi ge a zhes bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas par dmigs te/ zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer chen po des spos chu de khyab par gyur nas/ spos chu nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a mri te hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas te

byin gyis brlabs pas/ de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba'i sngags chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra bra marta na ya hU~M phaT ces lan bdun brjod de/ 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin

gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlab pa ni 'jim pa de nyid la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ rig pa chen mo'i gzungs 'di brjod

par bya'o/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sUk+Sh+me/ sUk+Sh+me/ shan te shan te/ dan te dan te/ ni ra ku le/ ya she ya she/ ba ti te tso shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hi te/ a na mo te hi te swA hA zhes bdag

nyid kyis rig pa chen mo 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs na 'jim pa nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna lnga phyogs bcur 'phos par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs

bcur 'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer de dag slar 'dus pas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM badzra a yu she swA hA zhes lan bdun bzlas te/ byin gyis

brlabs na/ 'bi 'bi nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phros shing khyab ste/ 'gro ba mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer gyi sprin phung de dag slar

'bi 'bi'i nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel sgong ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas 'bi 'bi nang du bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po mu dra'i

phyag rgyar byas pa'am/ gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shog shog gam/ shing shun la sngags bris pa dang / de'i nang du rigs lnga so so'i snying po/ oM hU~M tra~M hri~M aH/ de rnams phrugs su sbyar te/ mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am/

yi ger bris pa'am/ gang yang rung ste nang du stsal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra gar b+he swA hA zhes bya ba bzlas na de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas tse t+ya'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram/ til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa

chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a ra dze ba ri dze swA hA zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na de nyid thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang

dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten 'debs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra mud ka ra a ko Ta ya a ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ ces bzlas shing mchod rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba

las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po gong nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel ba las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten 'byam klas par

'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten phor bu'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la dbyung ngo / /oM d+harma d+hA tu ye swA hA/ d+harma d+hA tu gar b+he swA hA zhes lan bdun bzlas te mchod rten phyung na thabs dang shes rab

gnyis su med par 'brel ba las mchod rten chos kyi sku 'byam klas pa 'byung ste/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang

dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten snod nas phyung ba la 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM pra ma na ye swA hA zhes bzlas nas 'khor lo btsugs na rin po che'i gdugs dang / rin po che'i

tog dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i shar bu dang / dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten na bza' gsol ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di bzlas la gsol to/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he d+harma te swA hA zhes lan mang du bzlas te btab na chos kyi dbyings

rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten ltar btab nas dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am/ stong ngam/

gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig rdo'i stegs bu brtsigs pa ni sa'am/ rdo'am/ shing la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis te/ 'og gi khri yang seng ge'i khri'am/ rin

po che'i khri'am/ pad ma'i khri stegs su byas la/ de'i steng du 'go ma yeng dang / spos chus chag chag btab ste/ dbus dang phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhugs pa'i sa kun du gur gum dang / tsan dan gyi chus zlum por bskus

la/ srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bri ba yang mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am/ stong gang btab

pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra ba'i thig gis sa gcad par bya'o/ /mchod rten gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad pad ma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor

du bzhugs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha stu be swA hA zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzhag na bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par spyod par 'gyur

ro/ /de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni dang po dbus su dgod/ de nas shar du dgod/ de nas lhor dgod/ de nas nub tu dgod/ de nas byang gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i

sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra pad ma sa ya ye swA hA zhes lan gsum du bzlas la rdo rje dang pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas la/ sa gzhi dang / nam mkha'i khams dang rgya mtsho'i mdzings thams cad mchod

rten gyi gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /gzhan yang mchod rten re re btab nas thal byung dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la/ spos dang / me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol/

mchod rten gyi kha dog la sogs pa bsku ba ni zhi ba'i dkar po/ rgyas pa'i ser po/ dbang dmar po/ bsrung ba'i ljang khur dmigs te/ na bza' yang de de bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin du dmigs so/ /de nas

mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge ra~M dmar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ hU~M ra~M swA hA zhes lan gsum bzlas pas de nyid ye shes kyi

mi dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas

dkyil 'khor le'u tshe lnga'am/ brgya'am/ stong ngam/ gang bris pa'i dbus rnams su yi ge a dkar po gnas pa las rig pa chen po'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM a tsan dre maN Da la hU~M phaT/ ces grangs

ji tsam ran par bzlas na mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re rer 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang bder bltas la/ bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin

pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te/ snying kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtsa lnga pa ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la/ sku dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang /

sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprin phung bzhin du mthar 'byam klas par 'phros shing sems can gyi khams thams cad du byin gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te/ de bzhin

du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni mchod rten dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa la rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod rten gyi steng du reg par byas la/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags

'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra d+hA tu a d+hi tiSh+Tha hU~M zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi gnas khang gi nang na rin po che'i sa gzhi dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na

zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de ltar du mchod rten re re btab ste/ bzhag nas de la mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nas ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /

'bras chen dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang 'dra zhing dgod pa dang / bla re dang / 'phan dang / gdugs dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams rnam par dag par sbyang ba'i rig pa

chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarba pU dza puSh+pe swA hA zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas kun du bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam par 'khrigs shing char gyi rgyun bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po cha cha re res mchod cing / yon du dar ru chung dang / 'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang / gdugs bu chung yang rung ste re re dbul lo/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin

du btab pa lags na dgongs brgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang / rgyan dang / cha lugs dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa tshul bzhin du

dgongs te dmigs par bya'o/ /ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten de yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba de dag bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs kyi snying po dang / rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bru

re la kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du dang zhing 'tsher ba cig tu dmigs la/ de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs 'byam klas par rigs lnga phyogs bcu 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i

mthas klas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug par brgyan cing grub par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don 'di mdzad cing re ba bkang nas slar 'dus te/ de nyid kyi dbu'i

gtsug dang / thugs kar phog 'phrin las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dag ste/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la/ dung phor gyi nang spos chab dang / dri sna tshogs sbyar ba'i argas gsol to/ /

arga'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i steng du dung phor bzhag la spos chu'i nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te/ mchod

pa dbul ba'i rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a mri te arga~M pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du bdugs shing sbrengs te phul bas/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro/ /

tshig tu yang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do/ /de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus shing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams
cad bskur bar dmigs so/ /de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klag cing lan ci mang du brjod par byas la bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par gdab par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di bzhin du rdzogs par bya ba mi

bde yang rang gi lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skur bsgyur ba las dgongs pa mnyams par bya ste/ mchod rten dang / mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par dgongs te/ mchod

rten btab na yang cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang 'dra ste 'gal ba med do/ /de bzhin du ma gyur na yang bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'dri zhing 'chang bas mchod rten btab na cho ga rgyas par

mdzad pa nyid 'di yin te/ mchod rten de de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ma brjod na mchod rten la mchod pa phul zhing

mnga' gsol yang mnga' phul bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhung las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo / /rig sngags gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing / /dgongs pa'i ting 'dzin mi gsal bas/ /mchod

rten la sogs sku gzugs rnams/ /btab kyang rdzogs par yong mi 'gyur zhes 'byung ngo / /gang zhig gsang sngags dang dgongs par ldan pas mchod rten dang sku gzugs btab pa'i yon tan ni ji skad du/ mchod rten cho
ga dam pa 'di/ /bsod nams bgyis pa'i khyad par ni/ /gzungs 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis/ /gcig btab bye ba btab dang 'dra/ /yun ring dus nas 'khor ba yi/ /mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams/ /

ji snyed yod pa ma lus 'byang / /tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /tshe rabs gzhan du skye ba na/ /rigs mchog dam par skyes nas kyang / /longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing / /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por skye/ /

tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur/ /dus gsum 'jig rten thams cad du/ /dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing / /bgegs dang gnod pas de mi bskyod/ /bsam pa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/ /mthar ni mngon bar 'tshang

rgya'o/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //skar zhus// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ma Ni bi pu la bi mu da be shwA su pra tiSh+Thi ta gu h+ya~M pa ra ma ra ha s+yan kal pa rA dzA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa

nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin du rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par mdzad/ dpyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa thams cad dang / mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang

btul nas pham par mdzad de/ 'khor ba'i skyon 'khor ba'i chu bo'i pha rol tu gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling bkang

ba/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas sems can de dag gis 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra yang ma thos shing mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su bab par gyur

to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de yang rdol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma mdab ma stong pa/ sdong bu ni bai dUr+ya/ snying po ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ ze ba ni rdo'i snying po/ srid ni tshangs pa'i

'jig rten gyi bar la thug pa/ 'od dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ pad ma de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad du snang bar byas so/ /de nas pad ma de las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyis skul ba'i sgra

'di byung ngo / /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ma Ni badzra hri da ya/ badzra mA ra sai n+ya bid dra ba ni/ ha na ha na/ badzra gar b+he/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ sarba

mA ra ba ba na ni hU~M hU~M/ san d+ha ra san d+ha ra/ bud d+ha mai tri sarba ta thA ga tA/ badzre ka la pa a d+hi ti swA hA/ pad ma de las yang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag ste/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di

sgras bkang nas/ shAkya thub pa srid pa'i dgon pa las ni rgal/ bdud ni bcom/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni spangs/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs ni dral/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni sbar te/ gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus

sa gzhi rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud ni bcom pa legs so legs so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spu zing zhes byed cing lus 'dar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rig sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la 'dzam bu'i gling du byung lags/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar ma thos lags

so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin du rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ de'i mthus stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/ mtshon cha'i char 'bab pa 'di yang me tog sna tshogs su gyur te 'bab bo/ /gzungs 'di'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nas srog chags

bye ba btul to/ /'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus su pad ma 'di byung bar gyur to/ /lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di med par mngon bar rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus/ bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho

skems par ma yin te/ chos kyi sgron ma sbar bar mi nus so/ /lag na rdo rje ngas dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma spyod na ji srid ngas gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang / mngon bar brtson pas brtson 'grus ma byas kyi

bar du ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob par ma nus kyi/ phyis ngas sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/ /lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na

nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rje 'di'i ming bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /brjod cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang / dri dang / bdug pa sna
tshogs kyis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams de na yon tan gyi khyad par ci 'dra ba dag gda' ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag las gzhan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyi

tshogs bsags par mi bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje sems can de dag ni snyom las can/ brtson 'grus dman pa/ gti

mug gis rmongs pa/ 'dod pa'i dregs pas rmongs pa/ yid ches par dka' ba/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa de/

des ni gzungs 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur zhing / bsod nams chung ba/ skal ba chung ba/ blo zhan pa rnams kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur/ 'chad par mi 'gyur zhing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pas gsung pa'i gzungs 'di la dang ba skyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu nga ni 'di nas shar

phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba grong khyer kho ra

khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i ra ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang /

bu mo dang / skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing nor bu dang / gser 'bar ba'i mgo rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo brgyan pa/ lha'i gzugs can/ mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang

ldan pa/ shes nyen thams cad dang ldan pa rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pa/ snang ba yod par 'gro'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal po nor bu sna tshogs shes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/
blon po bye ba phrag brgyad bcus yongs su bskor cing btsun mo dam pa gsal byed ma zhes bya ba bud med nyi khri'i 'khor can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus la 'gran pa zhig yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams

de na yang me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / drang chu'i shing dang / dri'i shing gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no/ /chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams

cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin no/ /thang las skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rang bzhin yin no/ /mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri thub

ste/ thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa yin no/ /rgyal po de yang chos dang 'thun pas rgyal srid skyong bar byed kyis chos dang mi mthun
pas ni ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa can yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu chen po rnam par
bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ de bzhin

gshegs pa de ni gser gyi kha dog gi sku mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu mnga' ba/ 'od 'dom gang gis kun nas bskor ba/ 'od rin po che sna bdun ltar shin tu spa ba yin no/ /byang

chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi lus 'od 'phro ba/ mtshan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma'i stan la 'khod pa ste/ thams cad kyang spobs pa mi zad pa/ sgrib pa med
pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin du gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sems shing gzungs de nyid kyi

mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yang gzungs 'di sems can thams cad la rab tu ston to/ /sems can de rnams kyang gzungs 'di'i mthus bde ba nyams su myong ba ste

sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams las yongs su thar bar gyur to/ /ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyang bcad par gyur to/ /

mtho ris kyi sgo rnams phye'o/ /bde 'gro'i sgo thams cad kyang phye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs

so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ chu dang 'o ma gcig tu gyur pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na nor bu

chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin du rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /gang dag gzungs 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / 'don pa dang / sems pa
dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / chung ngu na ming nyan par byed dam/ lag pas reg gam/ lus la 'chang ngam/ mig gis mthong ba tsam 'am/ glegs bam la bris pa'am/ ras la bris pa'am/ brtsig pa la bris
pa mthong na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa'am/ shen pa'am/ gdol pa'am/ rngon pa'am/ bya ba'am/
long ba'am/ 'on pa'am/ sha bkra can nam/ bkren pa'am/ zhar ba'am/ sgur po'am/ dam dpa'am/ sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i sgrib pa can nam/ myong bar gyur par ma nges pa'am/ bdud kyi

zhags pas bcings pa'am/ lta ba ngan par lhung ba'am/ log 'dren gyis zin pa'am/ rgyu skar dang / gza' gnod par byas pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi

ldog par 'gyur ro/ /chung ngu na dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dgas dang / bya dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / grog sbur rnams dang / gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgo nga las skyes pa

'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa'am/ rdzus te skyes pa la sogs te/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de dag thams cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g.yos par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog uta pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man

dA ra chen po'i char yang rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi lus las kyang 'od zer byung bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun

gyi khang pa brtseg ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba/ nyams dga' ba/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi dod pa/ them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'od 'bar ba/ grwa bzhi na nor bu rin po che chen po bzhi nyi ma ltar

'bar ba/ nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi dra ba du ma spyangs pa/ dril bu mang pos mdzes par byas pa/ dar gyi ba dan mang pos kun nas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung

ngo / /sa 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul ldeg la sgra 'byin cing mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to/ /lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams cad bskul to/ /

rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bskul to/ /rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad kyang bskul to/ /lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / bar chad byed pa'i log 'dren
thams cad kyang dngangs skrag ste/ cho nges 'debs shing phyogs bcur byer ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang

bar byas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams bskul nas slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das khyod de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par

bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma de gzigs pa dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la bab kyis bzhud la nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bgyi
ba'i gzungs de yang rgyas par gson cig /bcom ldan 'das gzungs de ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags so/ /gzungs de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags te/ gang

la la zhig nyan tam/ chung ngu na ming ngam/ lag pas reg na yang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkye ste/ ji ltar
lhags pa'i 'khor de la bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu tshur sheg /de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byung ba ni 'di yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan las bzhengs pa dang / khang

pa brtseg ma de'i dbus su rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri byung nas/ khri de'i steng du rin po che'i pad ma bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ sdong bu ni gser/ pad ma'i snying po ni mu tig dmar po can zhig byung ste/ de la bcom ldan

'das bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu sa chen po 'di che thang du g.yos par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'khor

thams cad dbugs phyung nas steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de/ 'khor mang po dang / 'khod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs chen po dang / rnam par sprul pa

dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa mang po dang / rig

sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang po'i 'khor dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang gshegs so/ /

de thams cad shar phyogs logs su dong ba dang / tshad med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das nas nor bu sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin
par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/ /'jig rten gyi khams der byon ma thag tu nam mkha' las babs nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra' ba rab gnas gtsang ma de'i drung du gshegs so/ /der gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba
la reg par gnas sam zhes gsungs nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma mdab ma stong pa zhig byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa dang / des phyag gser

gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ zab cing zab pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ khang pa brtseg ma de nyid du bzhugs

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor lags sam/ khyod kyis bdud dpung dang gzhon par bcas pa bcom lags sam/ khyed kyis chos kyi sgron ma sbar lags

sam/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng lags sam/ chos kyi rnga brdungs lags sam/ chos kyi dung rab tu bus lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung ba bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen
par bgyis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis deng 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo chos kyi gter lan gnyis su bskor ba mdzod cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs
rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg /

'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem ste/ me tog gi char chen po yang rab tu 'bab/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang snang / sil snyan

rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin/ steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang gi lha'i bu rnams kyang lha'i sil snyan shin du yid du 'ong ba yan lag lnga pa dag dkrol bar byed/ klu chen po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs

kyi char 'bebs par byed/ dri'i phye ma sna tshogs dang / tsan dan gyi chu sna tshogs kyi char yang 'bebs par byed/ gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i mu tig

dmar po dang / spug dang / nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par snang byed dang / nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / chu shel dang / me shel dang / dpal gyi snying po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i me tog

ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i me tog dang / lha'i dngul las byung

ba'i me tog gi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i me tog gi phreng ba'i char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang a la la zhes sgra snyan par 'byin cing dbyangs kyang

rjes su sgrogs par byed/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par byed/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi rgyal

mtshan 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu spyod par bgyis pa legs

so legs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer sna tshogs bkye ste/ 'od zer de dag gis

phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bskul zhing snang bar mdzad do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang snang

bar mdzad/ lha'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams su yang bskul cing snang bar mdzad de/

slar log nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas slar yang gtsug tor gyi gseb du zhugs so/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad nas/ tshad med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtseg ma dag sprul nas/ khang pa brtseg ma'i nang du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri dag byung ba de la

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi 'khor dang / khang pa brtseg ma'i nang du zhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas de bzhin gshegs pa

de dag thams cad yang dag par dgyes par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod nas rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po
de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po yang rab tu gda'/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /

mi dang / mi ma lags pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gda'/ rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po yang lhags nas 'di lta ste/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lhags/

bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang gda' lags pas bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin du rab tu gnas pa gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so/ /tshod ni 'di

lags so zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu song la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsol ba thob shig dang /

des khyod la rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin du rab tu gnas pa gsang ba 'di sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rab tu bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa shAkya thub pas gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po song la 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus kyi sa phyogs su rdo rjes sa la snun cig /de nas

gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ 'khor gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba der song nas sa phyogs de la rdo rjes bsnun te sa la bsnun ma thag tu de

nas gru bzhir gas so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /g.yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtseg ma gru bzhi pa/ ka ba bzhi zug
pa/ sgo bzhi btod pa/ mnyam pa/ nyams dga' ba/ shin du rnam par phye ba/ chas mdzes par byas pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ 'od 'bar ba/ them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod la/

rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo / /khang pa brtseg ma'i dbus der yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi dra ba du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las

byung ba'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ dril bu du ma 'phyang du bcug pa/ dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi chun po du mas mngon bar brgyan pa zhig byung ngo / /mchod rten de'i dbus na de

bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtseg ma de la mchod pa mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de yang khang pa brtseg ma de dang /

mchod rten la mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /de nas

lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes te ya mtshan du gyur/ spro bar gyur nas khang pa

brtseg ma dang / mchod rten 'di ci'i phyir byung bar gyur ces ga zha'i sgra mthon por 'byin cing mchod rten dang / khang pa brtseg ma de la skor ba byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba

dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas 'khod de phyag 'tshal

bar byed do/ /de nas khang pa brtseg ma de las sgra byung ba/ kye 'khor mang po dag bar snang la ci snang ltos shig ltos shig /de nas ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis bar snang la bltas te bltas ma

thag tu bai dUr+ya dang / nor bu rin po che chen po las byung ba'i sprin gyi phung po chen po zhig byung ngo / /de nas sprin gyi phung po'i steng du nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin du rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs

'di yi ge gser gyi kha dog tu bris par mthong ngo / /nam mkha'i dkyil de nyid las sgra byung ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin du rab tu gnas pa gsang ba

zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklag tu gsol bklag tu gsol/ sgra byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar sprin gyi phung po la bres pa byung nas 'di skad ces kyang dbyangs su sgrogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das

shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod rten mchog 'di sgo phye shig /mchod rten de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs te/ de'i mthus cho 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i khyad

par chen po 'di snang zhing de kho na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yang snang / nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs
dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang bcas pa mtha' dag rdzogs shing rgyas par 'khor gyi dbus su legs par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyogs bcu nas
'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das mchod rten

rin po che 'di dang 'di na bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal po me tog rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rnam par bkra ba dang / rdo rje 'phags pa'i rgyal po

zhes bya ba de dag bstan pa'i skabs dbye bar mdzod cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po khang pa brtseg ma'i mchod rten gang na bar bzhud de/ phyag g.yas

pa gser gyi kha dog can bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa brkyang nas mchod rten mchog de'i sgo'i sgo 'phar phye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams bstan to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa legs so legs so/ /deng khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor to/ /bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'di

nyid la bzhugs shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchod rten gyi nang du khri de nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag khang pa brtseg ma'i mchod rten gyi nang du ci'i slad du byung / gang nas ni gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sngon byung

ba bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ gzhal gyis mi lang ba/ tshad gzung du med pa/ tshes grangs med pa na gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo

legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang zhing ma rmos pa/ ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu byung ste/ bdag gi ba med cing yongs su bzung ba med de/ 'jig rten thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa

de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas med do/ /de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba de la drang srong gsum zhig gnas te/ gcig gi ming ni nor bu'i gtsug tor/ gnyis pa ni gser gyi gtsug tor/ gsum

pa ni rdo rje'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste/ de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur

snyam zhing gcig tu sangs rgyas yid la byed/ chos yid la byed/ dge bdun yid la byed do/ /de nas drang srong de rnams de snyam du bsams nas yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar gyur cing sems pa na/ de rnams
